objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.

history.p: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).

lg.l: jaẏa jaẏa mātā go tāriṇī nārāẏaṇī
jaẏa jaẏa mātā go saṁsāra uddhāriṇī | 1 |
jaẏa jaẏa jananī go teja anargaḷā | 2 |
jaẏa jaẏa jananī go sumantra gāẏatrī
jaẏa jaẏa jananī go bhakta kr̥pādātrī | 3 |
jaẏa jaẏa mātā go praḷaẏa nistārīṇī
to pāda sebaka śrī sāroḷa dāsa bhaṇi | 4 |

div.note: jaẏa jaẏa māta go tāriṇī gosāmaṇi |(kha) [abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: bhīṣme daśa dibasa droṇe pañcha dibasa
jyeṣṭha putra goṭi te ra hoiba ẏekachatrī | 9 |
hāthare padma paẏare padma achai trahāra
anubrate lakṣmī bije karithibe ẏehāra kandhara | 10 |
panaṅgā abatāra hāde ẏe nārāẏaṇa mūrtti
unaśate putra rakhi rājā putre pāribu ki parityāgī | 12 |

div.note: banda ye namo durgā datya bināśinī
yāhāra buddhi beḷe go maẏeṁṣā galā hata
diasi phūraṇa māta go jaṅkheśvara ādimāta |
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsaku mukati patha debā |[abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: jyeṣṭha putra boli ẏe putra chadimela āśa
aneka bhoga bhmañjibu ẏehāre hoiba baṁśa nāśa | 13 |
bāḷakāḷe na kalu ye bidurara bola
bhīṣme śaraśayyā kale nāśa gale droṇe
jadyaratha aḷambhuga nāśagale paḍile sarbe raṇe | 15 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa pucchā kale śuṇa ho sañjaẏe
droṇa kathā śuṇi āśrija muhiṁ hoẏe | 16 |
kete senā paḍile ye na jāṇai muhiṁ | 17 |
mohora karme helā mora putraṁka ayaśa
bhāṣma droṇa prāẏe senāpati gale nāśa | 18 |

div.note: tumbha kr̥pā hele śrī mahābhāratha karibi lekhana |
jaẏa jaẏa durgā māgo jaẏa pāṭarāṇī
kara anagr̥ha mote śrī gaṇeśaṁka mātā
tumbhe sudaẏā kale murkha paṇḍi tare hoiba gaṇitā |
mote tumbhe yebe daẏā kara go mahāmāẏī
śrī mahābhāratha karṇṇaparba muhiṁ se lekhibaiṁ |

lg.l: kaema doṣe yeteka bīraṁku arghya dile
bhīṣme śara śayya, kale pāṇḍebaṁka hite
droṇaṁku śāpa acchi teṇu hoile muṇḍakāṭa | 25 |
jāṇai yebe anurūpe na kale kiṁpā japa | 26 |
āho dhr̥tirāṣṭa bhāradvādaśa boli yebaṇa mahāruṣi
yeteka mantra yantra tantra ye brahmakarma dharmamāna
droṇaṁkara hade se aṭai nija mātā
puṇa bhāradvādaśa pradāna hoile se banītā | 32 |
pañchu tīrthare bhāradvādaśa rahile māsa ye aṭhāra | 34 |
droṇa guruṁkara se anantā aṭe māẏe
mātāra śaẏana puraku droṇa kale bije
kāmabatī stiri ye anaṅga rūpa sāje | 38 |
se anantā kanyā ye hoilā garbhabatī | 39 |
upekṣile bhāradvādaśe na gale tāra kati | 41 |
bharadvādaśe boile śuṇasi re putra droṇa
samāsyā na phiṭāi ye droṇe hoileka tūnī | 43 |
dinā pāñchasāte puṇi śuṇile droṇaṁkara kathā
kope boile re tuhi mohora putra droṇa
putra hoi pāteka arjilu mātr̥ ye haraṇa | 45 |
dharma kathā chaḍi pāpa kalu ācaraṇa
mātāra śaẏana puraku droṇa kale bije
kāmabatī stirī ye anaṅga rūpa sāje | 38 |
se anantā kanyā ye hoilā garbhabatī | 39 |
upekṣile bhāradvādaśe na gale tāra kati | 41 |
bhāradvādaśe boile śuṇasi re putra droṇa
samasyā na phiṭāi ye droṇe hoileka tūnī | 43 |
dinā pāñchasāte puṇi śuṇile droṇaṁkara kathā
kope boile re tuhi mohora putra droṇa
putra hoi pāteka arjilumātr̥ ye haraṇa | 45 |
dharma kathā chaḍi pāpa kalu ācaraṇa
janme janme hou ye pantī tohora bhraṣṭa | 47 |
droṇa boile tāta kisa mohora gati
bhāradvādaśe boile tu chaṛi tapodhana beśa
kṣatribr̥tta ācari tu bharatha yuddhe paśa | 50 |
mātā haraṇa doṣuṁ hoibu tebe pāri | 51 |
bhāratha yuddhe paśile tu abaśya śiraccheda hoibu
kr̥pī peṭa ciri putra bāhāra ye kale
mātā hata hoilā putranāma aśastamā dile | 55 |
mātā haraṇa doṣe droṇaguru hoile śiraccheda
āho dhr̥tirāṣṭa āpaṇe se yāhā araji
pāteka kalā prāṇī abaśya tāhā bhmañji | 59 |
āpaṇe yāhā araji tāhāku karma boli
yāhāra nāma dhaile na daṇḍe kāḷayama | 62 |
biśvambara svamī he prasanna deba rājā | 66 |
umāra chaḷeṇa deba dakṣa yāga bhañji
gaṅgā yamunā sarasvatī ye bahucchi tini nadī | 71 |

div.note: śeta pīta kuṁkuma ye bahai tininadī |(ṭa, jha)

jagata bandana nātha kaṇṭheṇa kāḷakūṭa
jagata jībana nātha nāma nīḷakaṇṭha |(kha, ṭha, na, jha, ṭa)

lg.l: daśane prasanna nātha dukha sāgararu nemā | 74 |
kauśika bādeṇa svāmī brahmāra muṇḍa moṛi
samasta pātaka yāẏe tora nāma dhari
aniryyāpa mahima tote na jaṇanti kehi | 77 |
draśane duṣukr̥ta andha paṭaḷa galā phiṭi | 78 |
svāmi phaṭā ghumurā bijighoṣa marddaḷa dāuṇḍi
hari hara śūdreka yāhāra gyāna śakti
svāmi pañchadaśa baraṣa yāhāra hiraṇa garbha
samasta pāteka hr̥de uddhari dhailu mahādeba | 83 |
nāma saṁketa dukha daridra phiṭāi desi
sadā ānanda nātha mama hr̥de dhari
muhiṁ ehā bhābili mohora janmara abhyāsa | 86 |

div.note: candra dhvaja bibāne kāśīpura maṇḍi |(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: dibārātre bhābaiṁ muṁ deba ye śrīkāśī
badaẏanti śudramuni sāroḷadāsa svāmi bāṇarāsī ṭhāba desi | 87 |
droṇapaboṅg uttāre pañchadaśa dibasa antareṇa kathā
karṇṇa ye pahija kalā mānagobindara āge
kahibā mahātamā karṇṇapaboṅg hoilā kebaṇa bāge | 90 |
arghyeka gheni rājā ubhā hoilā karṇṇara āgara | 92 |
mānagobinda boilā tu ye aṭu prāṇasakhā
paṛile bhala bhala rājāẏe saini alekhā | 93 |
bho maitra tr̥tīẏa yugara kṣatrī aṭanti gurudroṇe
dvāpara yuga pāra kale se mahākṣatrīpaṇe | 96 |

div.note:
“karṇṇakaiṁ mukuṭa bānddhalā dhr̥tirāṣṭara tanaẏe” pare
‘cha’ re adhikā pāṭha–
aneka pratagyāṁ se kalā bīra karṇṇa

lg.l: hāthe śahasra thile jiṇi pārai dibibhmabi | 97 |
sohaṛa sundara bīre paṛu achanti mohora mandakarme | 98 |
bhīṣmaṁkara prathama dine yujheṣṭhi kale bijaẏe | 99 |
yāna bāhāna tejyākari kamaḷa māḷeka hāthe
astra śahasra tejyākari yujheṣṭhi caḷile pādagate | 100 |
samaste boile ho āu nohiba samara
śaraṇa paśibe boli aile yujheṣṭhi nr̥pabara | 101 |
boile yujheṣṭhi śaraṇa paśibe boli samasta śahasra kale tejyā | 102 |
dharmara nandana ye aile bhīṣṁaṁkara kati
bhīṣme boile bābu āmbhara āẏuṣa gheni brata
tote na jiṇile mote rājya prāpata kāhiṁ
ichāmr̥tu tohora ta trailokye jiṇantā kehi nāhiṁ | 106 |
bhīṣme boile mohora daśa dibasa yuddha
śrīkhaṇḍīki dekhile śahasra chaṛibu āmbhe raṇamadhya | 107 |

div.note:
śāntanuṁka bīryyuṁ jāta gaṅgā garbhadhārī
icchāmr̥tu tumbhara nāhiṁ ke samasarī |(kha, ja)

bhīṣme boile se nabama dina pariyante
āmbhe yuddha karibu uprodha nāhiṁ tote
daśa dibasa mātra sahithibu āmbhara yuddha
śrīkhaṇḍiku dekhile āmbhe hoibu prāṇe badhya |[ṅa, tha, cha] [abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre]

lg.l: droṇe boile tote bidyālakṣmī prāpata hou kṣaẏe yāu araṣṭi | 109 |
āmbhara āṣya gheniṇa sukheṇa thāa brati
śatr̥ jiṇi pañchu kaṭake hoa ẏekachatrī | 110 |
tote jiṇile se pañchu kaṭake rājya karu | 111 |
drone boiel mohora hāthe śara thile karuthibi raṇa
jiṇantā nāhiñ mote ẏe ye tini jagateṇa | 112 |
yujheṣṭhi boile mote kala yebe ẏeṛe bāñcchā
tote na jiṇile muṁ kemante hoibi rakṣā | 113 |
droṇe boile muṁ yebe śuṇai aśastamā hata
tebe se śahasra chaḍibaiṁ ẏe mohora satya | 114 |
śahasa chaṛile yebe mote pāribāka hāṇi
tebe sinā marai ho ẏe mohora dr̥ṛhabāṇī | 115 |
ẏe kathā pāṇṭabe ye dharithile hr̥de
kāḷe bhiāile āṇi ẏeṛe kūṭa bāde | 117 |

div.note:
“jiṇantā nāhiṁ mote tini brahmāṇḍara” pāṭha pare
tha o ca pothire adhikā pātha–
kaḷi bhiāile āṇi ẏesanaka bākya |(tha, ca)

lg.l: aśastamā ratha ye bhīmasena dilā phiṅgi
yamunā jiṇi paṛilā pañchu kataka parityāgī | 119 |
bhīmasena māilā ẏeṇe aśastamā nāme hāthī
aśastamā hata boli śubhilā sarba pr̥thī | 120 |
nar aki guñjara boli na jāṇanti kehi |
sabuṁkara mukhare ye nirādhāra bacana sādhye
yujheṣṭhi tahiṁki droṇe gale putra trodhe | 122 |
droṇe pucchante ye boile yujheṣṭhi mahārāja
pitā śatr̥ boli se kale śirachedana śāsti | 125 |
karṇṇaṁku kimpā muṁ āgahuṁ na samarpili sāṁgrāma | 128 |
harāili buddhi muṁ kāryyahiṁ nāśa kali
ẏehāra bahu baḷaku ādyahuṁ āśre na kali | 129 |
āstānuṁ uṭhi koḷa kalā rājā driyodhana
ẏebe se maitra mohora pheṛasi abhimāna | 130 |
karṇṇa boilā ẏebe niścinteṇa thāāsi mahārāja

div.note: saburiiṁ mukhare ye nirāśa bacana sādhye |(ṭa, jha, cha)
hastaru śasra pakāi mr̥cchāgate paḍile mahītaḷe |(cha)

lg.l: tote senāpati na kali barili droṇa āṇi | 132 |
karṇṇa boila maitra kathaẏe mote kara
śalyaku sārathipaṇe diasi bāhu mora rahubara | 133 |
karṇnakaiṁ gheni āstānuṁ rāja gala uṭhi | 134 |
kuśaḷa kahibi nāsti na karibu mahārāẏe | 136 |
śaḷalye boile rāẏe āmbhe kisa jyeṣṭha
āmbhe samaste andha tuhi se dibyacachu
āmbhe samaste mūrkha tuhi se paṇḍita achu | 138 |
āmbhara bacana rājā saburi atai byādhi
tahi se rauḷa ho samasta pratipāḷu | 142 |
sabya heu ki rājā asabya heu

div.note:
śailye boile mahārājā āmhe kisa śreṣṭhi
pr̥thibīre rājā tu pañchu kaṭake ādhipati |(tha, ṅa, cha)
tuhi se badya samasta pratipāḷu |(ṅa, ja)

pare adhikā–āmbhemane samaste aṭu gorupala–
tuhi se mahārājā aṭa rakhuāḷa |(cha)

lg.l: sārathi hoiṇa tumbhe karṇṇa ratha chāḷa | 144 |
sutaputra karṇṇara muṁ kemante hoibi sārathi | 145 |
candra huṁ baṛa se daśalakṣa baraṣuṁ | 147 |
inra debatāra sārathi ye aṭai mātaḷi
indra huṁ se daśasahasra baraṣa uguḷi | 148 |
karṇṇa rathe basi māmuṁ baṁśa mora rakha | 151 |
śalya boile rājā yebe bāhibi ẏehā ratha
karṇṇa boilā māmuṁ ratha mora chāḷi
śeta śaṅkha gokṣīra kāmapāḷa chārihaẏa sāje | 154 |
bāmadakṣiṇe kaṣithiba pāśupatra akṣaẏa troṇa duhiṁki | 155 |
ẏemantara ratha bheṭāibu neiṁ arjunara chamuṁ | 156 |
karṇṇara pratagyāṁ śuṇi śalye boile jībana tohora poṛu poṛu
ye tohora saṁgate nathāiṁ tāhaku kahibu mote kiṁpā bhaṇḍu | 159 |
āho karṇṇa apāra pratagyāṁ ye karuthānti mattahāthī
yetebeḷe dekhi na thānti siṁghara teja mūrati | 160 |
siṁghaku dekhile yehne paḷāi na pābanti ṭhāba
āho karṇṇa mahāghora andhakāra rātra thāi ghoṭi
āditya teja lāgile se yehne yāi phiṭi | 162 |
āditya parāẏe tote diśibaṭi pāṇḍaba dhanurjaẏe | 163 |
āho karṇṇa indura garjana parāẏe bujhaiṁ muhi tote
mañjārī dekhile se keṇe paḷāi paśai keuṁṇa gāte | 164 |
āho karṇṇa tohora pratagyāṁ indura prāẏeka aṭai
arjunaku dekhile na puṇa tote bāṭa na diśai | 165 |
āho karṇṇa nigama bhūmire ye garjai kāḷasarpa
tote garuda aṭai se paṇḍaba kirīṭī | 167 |
mote chaḍi na puṇa paḷāibu abaśya | 168 |
mohora chatrīpaṇa ẏebe dekhu tuhi sinā | 169 |
śalya boile muṁ apāra acchi dekhi
naba sahasra rājā ruṇḍa hoithile tāra ghare | 174 |
āho karṇṇa tohora gocare āṇidilā bhānumatī | 176 |
puṇa gala nāhiṁḷi ghoṣa ye yātrāku
koṭiẏeka yoddhā tule gheniṇa ye thilu
tahuṁ driyodhanaku bānddhanelā kāḷa ye naumi | 181 |
bābu kāḷanaumiki ye bandhana kari bibaccha
āho karṇṇa pañchāḷa deśare rājā dr̥padara ghare
lakṣe rājā thilenāhiṁ ki dropatī saẏambare | 184 |
āho karṇṇa birāṭara nagre ye godhana haraṇe
aṭhāra kṣauṇīki keuṁṇa śāsti na dilā ẏekājaṇe | 187 |
ke abā na thilaṭi ẏe kuru sāgare
āho karṇṇa apāra pratagyāṁ ṭhābe ṭhābe dekhilā tohora acchi
se karṇṇa nohi hoilu āna karṇṇa yebe
ẏe tohora pratagyāṁ sata karibā tebe | 190 |
karṇṇa boilā māmuṁ apāra kahilu aprīti
mohora sādriśe muṁ ye na pāili sārathi | 191 |
bho ślaya mohora dhanu dharante kr̥ṣṇe karanti śaṁkā
muhiṁ māribi pāṇḍabenta tote pāileṇa sakhā | 192 |
gatakathā chaḍi māmuṁ bāhā maitra ratha | 193 |

lg.note: kebaṇa prakāre tume jiṇima sarbasācī |(ca, gha, na, kha)

lg.l: śaṁkha śveta gokṣīra śuddha saṣṭikara barṇṇa | 196 |
mukutā māḷi māḷi mānikya jharā jhalakanti | 197 |

lg.head:

bhāiṅkara patana@}

lg.l: khāile mari nāma dhaile dibā raẏeṇī
maḷa mūtra paḍile pitr̥loke na pābanti pāṇi | 3 |
kāḷasarpa cihna karṇṇa bahilā ki gyānu | 5 |
lg.note: śaṁkha śveta padma śuddha saṣṭikara barṇṇa |(gha, ka, na, kha)
śuddha neta patanī śuddha saṣṭikra barṇṇa |(tha, ṅa)
udanti netara pātāṅga ālamba bilambamāna |(ñja, ka)

atīa–atība, bitapana–śobhāyukta ujjvaḷa |
raẏeṇī–rajanī, rātri, saṭika–sphaṣṭika, kaṇaẏa–sunā, kanaka

lg.l: ludubudu byādhi pāra hoile baśyānara agni | 6 |
khāṇḍeba bane ye yetka jība thile
ẏehāra nandana hade mahākāẏa parā sarpa | 8 |
hatacandra sarpa ye ẏehāra aṭai tanu | 10 |

lg.note: baśyānara agniye samastaṁku bhakṣile |(ja, cha, ñja)
biśyānara agni ye samastaṁku dahile |(kha, na, ṅa, tha, gha)
samaka (gha) sanya (ṅa) śalya (tha) boli ye nāga mahabaḷī || (keteka pothi)

lg.l: khāṇḍeba bane se thile hoile sarbe dhvaṁsa | 18 |
bichārai kāḷasarpa arjuna mohora baṁśa kalā nāśa

lg.note: ẏehāra kuṭumba sabu tahiṁ yānte poḍi
ẏe sarpa prāṇa rakhilā kūpajaḷe buḍi ||
sehi kāḷe ẏehi sarpa beḷakāḷa pāi
tara kicchi dina pare kauroba keśarī
seṭhāre haraṇa kale ye kāḷe godhana
br̥kṣe caḍhi astra mora āṇa śrīgragati ||
astra kāṛhante se sarpa daṁśila hātare || (abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: karṇṇara chamure thoi draśana kalā puṇi | 21 |
lg.note: “karṇṇara chamure thoi draśana kalā puṇi” pare “ja” pothire adhika pāṭha :–
ẏe tiniru bane mote rakhantā kehi nāhiṁ ||
bhalā daiba se mote ẏehāta bihilā ||
lg.l: banabāsa sāri pāṇḍabe matsyadeśe rahibe gopyāna ||

div.note: āẏudha āṇite galā bīra atīẏa bahane ||
pāṇḍaba boli daṁśilā uttara kumāraku || (abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: śahasra bheda nohiba tohora śarīre thile byāpi
śarīra mr̥tu nohiba aneka kāḷa yiba yadyapi | 22 |
karṇṇa boilā tu ye dilu mote apūrba padārthe
toṣeṇa rādheba boilā bara māga ho kāḷasarpa
yehne bara māgibu tote ẏethaku debaiṁ anarūpa | 24 |
śoṣeka kāḷesarpa boila muṁ tohora rathe thibi
ghāntiẏe peṣibu muṁ nandighoṣa ratha giḷibi | 25 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu agasti kahile
pheru bistāra kari phuphu kāre garji | 27 |

div.note: re re kāḷasapa tuhi se baḍa duṣṭamati ||
arjunara tahuṁ se ẏe bacana śuṇilā
hā hā daiba boli sarpa mane bicharilā ||
ẏe beḷe śatr̥ku muṁ na kali nipāta
muhiṁ ẏebe na bratibi arjuna śaraghāta ||
ẏe mahīmaṇḍaḷe mote rakhantā kehi nāhiṁ ||
bada chatrī aṭai se sūryyara nandana
bārānidhiru āṇithilā ye abheda kapaba maṇi
boilā karṇṇa chamure ẏehā dekhāibi puṇi ||
śuṇa ho caitana hāde manu boile |(jha, ñja, gha, cha, ṭa)
teṇukari karṇṇa rathadhvajare thile |(kha, ṭha, na, ja)
“pheru bistāra kari phuphu kāre jarji ehi pāṭha pare “ṭha” pothire bhinna pāṭha :– (abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: biṣa laharī jāṇi bistāra karai teja
sarba maṅgaḷa kari karṇṇa rathare kale bije | 30 |

div.note: se sabu kahilā ẏebe śuṇa yuddha kathā ||
śaṁkha śveta gokṣīra ye kāmapāḷa bājī |(kha, na)
“sehi sambhara prāẏeka yocilā charibājī” pare ‘ja’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
uluka pachī āsi āgare dilā rāba
tela pasarā gheni teli caḷilā ye ābega ||
āpaṇāra śasra dhari bīra karṇṇa jhamakānte
śire bāji rodhira paḍilā paḍilā bhūmigate ||
karṇṇa boilā maitra śuṇimā hou bāṇī
ẏehi aśaṁkunya mote bhala nuhe jāṇi ||
āge bāsudeba ratha duje samara bhūmi ||
na bāra maitra mote muṁ māribi arjunaku ||
tripurā bibāde yehne bijaẏe trinetra || (abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: parama sānanda hoilā managobinda tāhā dekhi | 32 |
ẏebe se maitra mohora pheḍiba durgati
abasāna kāḷaku nātha tuhi se karibu sadagati | 33 |
pratagyāṁ kari boile āpaṇe kr̥pa āchāryye
mohora bhāge nakuḷa sahadeba hoile beni ye ātmaje | 36 |

div.note: “sarba maṅgaḷa kari karṇṇa rathare kale bije” pare ‘cha’ pothire bhinna pātha :–
nidāgha rabi prāẏe karṇṇara teja jhaḷi |
karṇṇara mūrati dekhi pratagyāṁ kalā dhuśāsana |(ja)
“mohora bhāge nakuḷa sahadeba hoile beni ye ātmaje” pare ‘ga’ pothire adhikā pātha :–

lg.l: droṇaṁkara abhābe ye senāpati hoile bīra karṇṇa
aneka puruṣārthe kalāka kuru ye rājana | 39 |
śalye sārathi ye hoile karṇṇa rathe
mana birasa svāmī kimbhūta kāraṇe tumbhara | 41 |
gobinde boile karṇṇa ye bhārathe bhāroi malla
yāhara nārāja dhaile muhiṁ karai bhaẏe
na puṇa tote rakṣākari nuārai dhanurjaẏe | 43 |
arjuna boilā deba sahasre hou karṇṇa
dui sahasra sārathi hou śalyara samāna | 44 |
anagr̥ha nātha tumbhe ẏekā thāānte mora rathe
nimiṣeke māribiṭi karṇṇa śalya śakuni sahite | 45 |
svāmī tumbhara tule samara gacchilāāja dhuśāsana | 46 |
bhīmasena boilā dropatīra kāhiṁ ẏeḍe puṇya
āja se pāñchāḷīra keśa hoiba bandhana | 47 |
tu debī āja go thibuti bāta chāhiṁ
sāja sāja boli ye śubhilā garuḍāḷa

div.note: aneka puruṣārtha kari paṭhiāile kuru ye rājana |(ja)
mana ta birasa ho tumbhar aẏe kisa bichāra |(tha, ṅa)

lg.l: rtu yebe daẏā mote karithilu bhīmasee
sarbe uburila mora pitā paḍile sāṁgrāme | 52 |
āho bhīmasena keuṁṇa pātaka muhiṁ kari thilāiṁ pūrbe
tāhā bichāriṇa prajāpati ẏe daṇḍa bihilāka ẏebe | 53 |
pāñchāḷa deśa rājā brāhmaṇa kuḷe uttama
kāhāra karyye pitā mora paḍilā sāṁgrāma | 55 |
āho dhr̥ṣṭadyumana ye śrīkhaṇḍī bhrātha beni
dropada parāẏe pitā marāi re bhāi
puṇihiṁ āsiacha re pāṇḍabaṅkara mukha chāhiṁ | 57 |
śrīkhaṇḍī boile māta go na kara tumbhe trodha
tu ho parameṣṭhi māgo sukhe thāā ṭhākurāṇī

div.note:
tu yebe daẏā mote karithilu bhīma
tumbhe tarila mora pitāṁku deiṇa sāṁgrama |(ca, jha, tha, cha)
kṣatrī hāthe paḍi pita galā baikuṇṭhaku |(ja)

lg.l: nandighoṣa ratha āsai īśānya bhāga kati | 62 |
karṇṇara rtha ye pacchima dige diśi
karṇṇa boilā māmuṁ kr̥ṣṇa arjuna ẏekaātmā
mote apacaẏe paḍile kisa karibu mahatama | 64 |
śalya boile tuhi ye samare paḍile
athabā samare muṁ jiṇi nuāile hari
gobinde boile muṁ dekhile tote niūna
catreṇa badha karibi śalya sahite hāde karṇṇa | 68 |
dhanu troṇa thoi pāde praṇapatya phālaguni | 69 |
tu mohora sakhā ho aṭu prāṇara pañchabhuta | 70 |
āho arajuna muhiṁ aṭai śrīrāma tu aṭu laikṣaṇa
tuhi ye nara muṁ aṭai nāraẏaṇa
bāre bāre arjuna tu mohora pañchaprāṇa | 72 |
tāhāṁku muṁ na sahili tohora nimanta | 73 |
bābu śalya karṇṇa boliṇa tu kimpāi dharu hr̥de
tote abhāba hoile harabrahma nāśibaiṁ hāde | 74 |

div.note: mote aprāñjaẏe paḍile kisa karibu mahātamā |(kha, ga, ja, ta, ṭa)
dekhiṇa karṇṇa śalyaku bahuta praśaṁsi |(ṭha, cha, tha, ṭa, ṅa)

lg.l: śaṅkha śabada kariṇa calile śrīkr̥ṣṇa arajuna
karṇṇa arjuna duheṁ ye hoile bheṭābheṭi
karṇṇara ratha prathamahuṁ galā śateka bhaḍā ghuñchi | 78 |
śaila sarathi puṇa neiṁ ṭekileka ratha
arjunaku dekhi pratibākya kalā ādityara suta | 79 |
droṇa prāẏe mote kire bujhilu tu pātha
napuṁsaka dekhiṇa se samara kale tejyā | 81 |
karṇṇa boilā mote tu na jāṇu ki samare
āja ẏethuṁ jībana gheni yāuki nija pure | 82 |
arjuna boilā ho karṇṇa māile ki hāki
baḍa rāuḷa nohaiṭi se gāṛheṇa yebe ḍāki | 83 |
dhanu śahasra ẏebe dhara mohora tule
bujhibānā samare āu ke jiṇi pārai hāde bhale | 84 |
karṇṇa boilā śalye karu kimpe heḷu
ratha mohora ghuñchiyāi kimpāi na sambhāḷu | 86 |
śalye boile karṇṇa ho na ghuñchile tohora ratha
chāri aśvanta tohora kāṭantāni tāhāra śahasranta | 87 |

div.note:
arjuna boilā re gāṛhabakya yebe ḍāki
baḍa rāuḷa hoiki re gāṛheṇa yebe hāki |(ka, gha)

lg.l: puṇi śalye nandighoṣa chamure nei ratha ṭeki
śateka nārāja yahuṁ binddhalāka bīra karṇṇa
puṇihiṁ śateka nārāja binddhalā arjuna uparaku
śateka nārāja binddhalā kapi ye ketanaku | 91 |
chāri aśvanta ye bindhai pañchabiṁśa bāṇa
nabalakṣa guñjara sāta kṣauṇī sanya tule
kāḷa kr̥tānteka jāṇi śūnyabhmabana deha byāpī | 98 |
bho pitā kaḷiṅgasenara tule mohora gārimā sāṁgrāma | 99 |
gadāghāte kaḷiṅgasenara nabalakṣa guñjara uḍāibi boili | 100 |
mohora gadāre svāmī biśrāma karukinā kṣaṇe
pabanakaiṁ dhyāẏe kari pratagyāṁ kala bhīma
bāāna bāāna bhāra gadā benikare dhari
boile ki yoge pabana hoile ẏeḍeka mūrati
bihantā puruṣamāna kehi rahi nuāile svarge
nabalakṣa guñjara sāta kṣauṇīra tule kaḷiṅgasena rāẏe
samasteheṁ paṛile yāiṁ agāda sindhu jaḷe | 109 |
ẏesaneka bitrama mūrati hoilā brikodara kāhiṁki | 112 |
śuṇiṇa āśrija ye bilamka deśa rāẏe
ẏe bhāratha nindā yebe karai taponidhi

div.note: antaraḷe bulāilā cakragati kari |(kha, ṭha, na)

lg.l: nindā kaleta na yāi saṁprate baḍe
se bhīmasena kāẏe keḍe gadābara hoilā keḍe | 115 |
gadābara bātaghāta kete hoilā muni he
ẏe kathā lāgilā mote baḍāi sandeha | 116 |
āṭha sahasra aṭhāśi hātha hoilāka uñcha | 119 |

div.note:
“āṭha sahasra aṭhāśi hātha hoilāka uñcha”
pare “pa, ṅa, tha” pothidvaẏare bhinna pāṭha :–
ẏe bidhiẏe dvāpara yugaku bhareka kahili |
ẏeka aṅgāẏe dui aṅgāẏe aṭai gaja bhāre
ẏe bhābe sahasrebhāra bahai bikrodare |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: ẏe bidhi dvāpara yugaku bhāreka kahili | 123 |
ẏehi bhāre ẏe bahantā lokaku sabhāba
ẏe aṅgāẏe dui aṅgāẏe aṭai gaja bhare
ẏe bhāre sahasre bhāra bahanti mahābīre | 125 |
ẏehi mahābhāre bāāna bāāna bhāra duigada bahai
ẏe gadā bighāte ye parbata na sahai | 126 |
ẏehi gadā piti bhīmasena parbata kalā cūrṇṇa | 127 |
ẏe bidhi benigadā bulābante bīra bhīmasena

div.note: sehi 119|2 sthānare “kha, ṭha, na” re bhinna pāṭha :–
sahasreka praḷaẏe śroṇeka hāde boli jāṇi
sahasreka śroṇe dvāpara yuga bhāra gaṇi |
ẏe bhāra bahibā lokaṁkara ye sabhāba
ẏe bidhi sahasre bhāre bīramku aṅgāẏe hoiba |
ẏe bhāre sahasra bhāra bahanti mahābīra |
ẏe bhāra bāuna bhāra bhīmasena bahai
ẏe gadāra bighāta ye parbata na sahai |(kha, na, ṭha)

lg.l: tula hoiṇa bahantā yebe pabana aṇañchāma
sthābara jaṅgama kīṭa pataṅga ye huante sarbe nāśa | 131 |
kaḷiṅgasenara matta hāthīmāne diśile chamgaḷa yūthaprāẏe | 132 |
kauroba baḷaku ye dekhāilā sehi mr̥tti | 134 |
raṇa manthana bhīma thāṭhe kalāka mahāgoḷa | 136 |
ratha gaja aśva ye saini pādānti
aṭhāṇoi bhāi achanti gadẏe gadāẏe gheni | 138 |

div.note:
“kaḷiṅgasenara matta hāthīmāne diśile chagaḷa yūtha prāẏe”
ehi pada pare “cha” pothira adhikā pāṭha :–
āho bhīmasena ẏebe gadā tu saṁhara

lg.l: kauroba baḷa sabu ẏehikṣaṇi | bikotiba brikodare | 139 |
tumbhe ye chatrībara sāṁgrāme pratagyāṁ jagajjethī
kehu rthe kehu gaḍe kehu haẏare piṭhi
ke konta lāṁkiā māre guruja parigha yāṭhi | 142 |
ẏekamukha hoi kale re re kāra śabade
kampilā medinī ye sabuṁkari mukha ghoranāde | 143 |
bichārai āja se keśa bandhana hoibāka dropatī | 144 |

div.note:
“kauroba baḷa sabu ẏehikṣaṇi bikotiba brikodare” |
pada pare ‘cha’ pothira adhikā pāṭha :–
ẏehi samaẏe śaṁkuni mantrī kahai chaḷi |

lg.l: duraṅgā durbhāga durlabha durbhaẏa duṣkāma durāmaẏa
durddaṇḍa dusiddhi dutanu dusiṁha durnāma durāśaẏa | 151 |
ẏe bidhi śataṇoi bhāi ye gariṣṭha
ẏekamukha hoi bhīmasena tule kaleka aniṣṭa | 156 |
śahasranta bulāi dhāiṁ se mahānāda kari
roṣeṇa brikodara ye kareṇa benigada gheni | 158 |

div.note: śahasranta bulāi dhāiṁ se bāhānāda kari |(ṭa, jha)

“māra māra boli bhīmasena kaiṁ beḍhi”
pada pare ‘ja’ pothire bhinna pāṭha :–
gadā sābeḷī nei bhīmasena upareṇa piṭi |
tāhā dekhi bhīmasena bāmaaṅga dilā pāti
paḍiṇa sarba śahasra cūrṇṇa hoilāka jhāti |

lg.l: bhīmasena boilā re tumbhanta loḍai niti
ẏetedine mohora chamure paḍile re māribi bikoti | 159 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa poẏe boile bhāile tote nitye loḍuthāuṁ
chaUdaśa dibasa hoilā bheṭa ye na pāuṁ | 160 |
ẏetedine tumbhara tule āmbhara sāṁgrāma paḍilā | 161 |
ẏebe re pāṇḍabe rājyaku aila kemante | 162 |
tote ẏekā māie nikaṇṭaka hoiba āmbha rājya
ẏetedne bhīmā re paḍilu āmbhara āga
nāśakara debatā pāñji pāñji tora pocchilāni bega | 164 |
harihara ādikari ke ukhi ta pārai
cauda brahmāṇḍe tote re rakhaṇḍā kehi nāhiṁ | 165 |
ẏeteka bacana ṇuṇi se bīra bhīmasena
sarbakari gadā ye paḍilā bhīmasena aṅga
piṭai gadā ye bāāna bhāna kare
ratha gaja aśva ye paḍi hoanti cūnā
raṇa dhandoḷa karai ẏekā brikodara jenā | 173 |
ke dante tiraṇa ke paḍanti mukhamāḍi
ẏe tohora śaraṇa boli daśanaha mukhe bhari | 175 |
śaraṇa boile goḍāi duguṇa piṭai nirddaẏe | 176 |
gada piṭante ākreṣi dhai bīra bhīma | 178 |
ke parigha gheni bulāi piṭanti bhīma baẏesthaḷe
parigha kunta guruja paḍi hoile sarbabhaṅga | 180 |
ratheka kare dhariṇa bhīma āreka rahe piṭi

div.note: śarīra kampu acchi bāte pātāṅgara prāẏe |(ṅa. ña. tha. jha. ṭa)

“bātaghāte yesaneka kadaḷībana paḍai mahīloṭi”
pādānta pare ṅa. ṭha. tha. pothi traẏare adhikā pāṭha :–
kehu se jībana nirāśe karai samara
rāhura teja ki ugāḷe niśākara |(ṅa. ṭha. tha)

lg.l: dui dui aśvanta dhariṇa bhīmasena piṭai
gaja aśva rāuta paḍi guṇḍā uṭhai | 184 |
ke raṇe nisata hoi chāhānti leuṭi
parastāpa bākye ẏe ṭhika ṭhika kathā
tarjai garjai se samare pāṇḍaba raṇaṣaṇā(?)
asthicarma māẏeṁsa ye na rahai kicchi
mukharu rudhira ye nāsikā bāṭe gaḷi
kapāḷa phāṭante paḷābanti gaje kumbha sthaḷanta toḷi | 192 |

div.note: debagaṇa gandharba ke samare rahiacchi |(kha. ṭa. jha)

tinikoṭi aśva sāta kṣeuṇī pādānti
samasta jana ẏekā bhīmasena ye nipāti |(kha. ṭha. na)

“raṇaraṅge āsanti se pāṇḍaba sundare”
pare, kha, ṭha, na re adhikā pada :–

lg.l: ahibrateka ratha ye pāñcha ahibrata hāthī
kauroba saini se ẏeteka hoileni nāśa | 196 |
ẏeteka sanya māri bhīmara kopa nohilāka śānti | 198 |
gobinde boile bābu raha raha bhīme
bhīmasena boilā deba māili ẏete bhāi
dhaśāsana boli deba ke cihni nuārili muhiṁ | 200 |
svāmī kāhā kāhākaiṁ muṁ māili āja raṇa
dhuśāsana boli keṭi na galā bāraṇa | 202 |
daṇḍeka mātra beḷa ẏebe yugateṇa acchi
muhiṁ kemante chāhiṁbi āja pāñchāḷīra mukha | 205 |
dhuśāsana paḍiba boli debī thiba bāṭa chāhiṁ | 206 |

div.note: sāta kṣeuṇī rathī naba kṣeuṇī pādānti |(ṅa, tha)
kādambaī pāne yehne teja anargaḷā |(ṭa, jha, kha, na)

lg.l: muṁ āja rahibi svāmī ẏehi raṇaraṅga bhūmi
chāri pāṇḍabanta gheni bije karibā debasvāmī | 207 |
gobinde boile bābu tora pratagyaṁ kalu sachā
dhuśāsana paḍithile āja tāku ke karaṇḍa rakṣā | 208 |
arghya gheniṇa patha chāhiṁthile ye pāñchāḷī
śatr̥jita pātāṅga sabuṁri rathe bājanti jaẏetūra
āgeṇa jaẏaśaṅkha dhuni ye śubhai bistāra | 211 |
baḍāi uchura ta āja deba banamāḷī | 212 |
bichāre paṇḍita nātha tuhi se jagunāhā
samare gobinda āja māila kāhā kāhā | 213 |
gobinde boile go arghya na diasi mote
bhīmasenakaiṁ bandāa go se kāraṇa kariba tote | 214 |
āja yuddhe brikodara sabunti māriṇa śuāi | 215 |
nabalakṣa kuñjara sāta kṣauṇī baḷa tule kaḷiṅgasena

div.note:
“dhuśāsana paḍithile āja tāku ke karantā rakṣā”
padapare ‘ka’ pothira adhikā pāṭha :–
pañchu pāṇḍabanta rathe basāiṇa bijaẏe jaintā name rājā

lg.l: āja yebe dhuśāsana paḍantā bhīmasena mukha
dropatī boile hari ẏe bāḷuta tanu
pitā mohora dropada śira cchedana hoilā | 220 |
birāṭa paḍilā gheni śaṅkha śveta ye uttara
guru paramaguru māile se roṇa senāpati | 223 |
aṭhāṇoi bhāi māile se aṭanti bāḷuta
ẏehānta māri kr̥ṣṇa tora ẏeḍeka uṣata | 224 |
bhr̥tyapaṇa prāẏe hoi basile kapaṭa paśākāḷe | 226 |
hari āstāne basi āgyāṁ dilāka driyodhana
ẏe mohora keśa dhari nelāka dhuśāsana | 227 |
sehi dinuṁ keśa muhiṁ rāge na bānddhali

div.note:
“pitā mohora dropada śira cchedana hoilā”
padapre kha, na, tha, ṭha pothimānaṅkare bhinna pāṭha :–
nirlaja kṣatrī ẏe jībana thāi ẏe pāñchaṁka śarīra |

lg.l: śrikāḷa yūthanta hari paśi māila ye raṇe
hari siṁgha prāẏe kari muṁ ẏehānta thili bujhi
na jāṇi caṇḍāḷuṇī muṁ pratagyāṁ hāde kali
hani sabhāre pratagyāṁ se kalā bīra bhīma
tebe se keśa bandhana karibuṁ dropada dulāḷī | 234 |
sataprāẏe muṇi ẏehāṁka bacanaku kali āśa
svāmī jībante ẏeteka abastā kāhāra bhariyā
kṣatrīkuḷe basite se na pābanti lajjā | 236 |
bhīmasena boilā mote jhiṁghāsa na kara go māẏe
kāli dinakara madhye khaṇḍibi tohora apacaẏe | 237 |
dhuśāsana bhmaja yebe na opāḍibi kāli
sehi raṇabhūmire muṁ maribi agni jāḷi | 238 |

div.note: sāmaratha lokaṁku dekhi paḷāile ẏeṇeteṇe |(kha. na. ṭha)
bidhabā stirī saṅge lekhā ta hoili |(ṅa. tha)
rodhira dei keśa bandhana hoiba dropada dulāḷī |(ṭa. jha)
kṣatrīkuḷe jātahoi na pābanti lajjā |(ṅa. tha)

māẏe-māī-mātā, ādaraṇīẏā strīra saṁbodhana, kauṇasi strīra
madhya saṁbodhana, (hindī) eṭhāre mātā arthare nuheñ
māẏāra artha madhya nārī |

lg.l: kope kahai debī māna agi gheni | 240 |
dhuśāsanaku na māile agnire paśibu boilu | 241 |
ẏete boli debī galeka nija purī
ucchaba kale pāṇḍabe ye jaintā nāme nagrī | 242-441 |

div.head:
{@duryyodhanara aṭhāṇoi bhrātāṅka mr̥tyure śatāṇoi
badhū o dhr̥tarāṣṭra, gāndhārīṅkara biḷāpa@}

lg.l: hāthara kaṇaẏa ratna cūḍimāna pāṣāṇe kachāti
bidhabā lakṣaṇa bahile ye samasta yubatī
lāja gauroba chaḍile ye sakaḷa yubatī
chāmure paḍi boile ẏehā kalu ho māna catrabratī | 5 |
sodaranta marāi ho kehne dhaila deha
nilajja ātmā gheni ābara kāhāre kathā kaha | 6 |
gauḍa bāuḍa boli tāṁku sabhāre na dila ye basi | 8 |
bināyuddhe chatrī muṁ sūcīmune pr̥thibī na debi | 9 |
ābara jhiṁghāsa tumbhe ye kala śrīhariṁki
śaṁkunira baṁśa pathara ghare kala nāśa
upāẏe se māhāmantrī tumbhara baṁśa dhvaṁsa | 12 |
dhika dhika hou se pāṇḍabaṅkara jībati
ẏe āmbhara bidhabā abastā ẏeṇu kari
kebaṇa bāgeṇa ẏebe śarīra thibu dhari | 14 |
mūrddhanā pāṁṭiyāu tumbhara māẏeṁsa gidhanī pacchī | 15 |
śire kara tāḍi ye robanti uṁcabāṇī
āmbhara abastā hou tohora bhānumatī rāṇī | 16 |
bahutara bacana kāhiṁ ẏekā jaṇake ye meṇṭi
svāmī aṭhāṇoi bhāi tora paḍile ājara yuddhe
samasta sākhāẏe ta nāśagale raṇa madhye | 19 |
svāmī keuṁṇa upāẏa ye kariba jaṇa tini

div.note: saṁcaẏe biṛāilu ẏekā jaṇakara buddhi ẏeḍeka baṁśagoṭi |(ka)
svāmī keuṁṇa upāẏa kari bratila tumbhe tini |(ṭa, jha)
“dhuśāsana driyodhana mantrī ye śaṁkuni” pare kha, na, re pāṭha :–

ẏekāḷe sañjaẏa bole śuṇa kururāṇa
māibhā to śatāṇora putra bhīmasena |

lg.l: sañjaẏa kāndhe hātha dei robai mahākaṣṭa | 21 |
āre āre bābu kāhiṁ achu mo māngobinda
ẏe tumbhara abastā dekhibāku muṁ batiacchi andha | 22 |
ẏesaneka samaẏe gāndhārī dhr̥tirāṣṭa sañjaẏe bidura
mahātrodha karanti ye yāiṁ rājāra chamura | 23 |
āre āre bābu andhara lauḍi mohora
tumbhanta muṁ maribāku jātakali ki bhīmara hātara | 25 |
tohora bola na kali mohora hoilā ẏeḍe kaṣṭa | 27 |
bābu dhuśāsanaku gheni paḷāi rakṣākara jībati | 28 |
ẏebeheṁ mohora bola kara baṁśa hou rakṣā
bidure boiel ho ẏetebeḷe kipāṁiṁ ẏehā kahu
paḍā pāñchakhaṇḍi dia ẏebeheṁ baṁśa rahu | 30 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boile bābu na dhara āna buddhi
bidura yāiṁ kr̥sṇaṁku kahi karu kāryyasiddhi | 31 |

div.note: bhīma hāthe maribāku ki samaste thila baḍhi |(kha, na, ṭha, ṅa)
robai anteśvara pure putraṁka nāma dhari |(kha, na, ṭha, ṅa)

lg.l: bidure boile ẏeḍe daẏā mote karai śrīkr̥ṣṇa
mohora bākya pāṇḍabe na karanti āna | 33 |
dropatī keśa boṅgdhana kari achai dhuśāsanara nimante
tāhākaiṁ sanddha karibi se daẏā karanti mote | 34 |
buḍilāra beḷe sabhiẏeṁ āsi houacha daccha | 35 |
samasta budāi ẏebe dharma dharma sumari | 36 |
ẏetebeḷe kehi mote na bola kūṭachanda | 37 |
mānaagni gheni ye poḍai mora hiẏā
baṁśayāka marāi ho prīti kehne karibi dorehā | 38 |
ẏe tumbhara bacanamāna mote na rucai adyāpi
ābara jībanaku ki āśa karibi mahāpāpī | 39 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa chamure muṁ yāhā kalāiṁ dr̥ḍhabrata
mānagobinda boilā jībana mohora dhika dhika
sabunti marāi muṁ sanddhareṇa paśibi kehneka | 41 |
driyodhana boilā āho bidura muṁ kāhāra bola na śuṇai
jhāsibi raṇayāge yāhā mo karme bihiacchi lihi | 42 |
yāhāreṇa śakya acchi mohora tule hoasi saja
nohile ye yāhā mandire yāā mohora hatahou pache rājā | 43 |

div.note: samādhā karibi se daẏa karanti mote |(kha. na)

“śarīre jībana thibāyāẏe mora sāṁgrāmahiṁ satya” pare
“ja” re adhikā pāṭha :–

mānagobinda mukhuṁ ẏesaneka bākya śuṇi
bidura mahātamā ye mane mane guṇi |
sabunti marāiṁ muṁ śaraṇa paśibi ẏeka |(ka. jha. ṭa. ka. cha)

lg.l: sanya sāja sāja boli āgyāṁ dilā sehu jhāti | 44 |
indra praśastakaiṁ śubhilā gaha gaha ghoraḍāka | 45 |
kopānaḷa agni svāmī poḍai mora mana | 46 |
bhīmāra rodhire āja muṁ karibi tarpaṇa
bābu bhīmāra tule āja tu na karibu dvanda | 49 |
bābu yebaṇa dina dropatīki bibasra kalu sabhātaḷe
sehi dinu kaṣṭhora kari dropatī na bānddhalā bāḷe | 50 |
tāhāra chamure tora kisa ye gārima | 51 |
tohora tahuṁ dhuśāsana mohora āna nāhiṁ sakhā
tote pramāda paḍile muṁ hoibaiṁ narekhā | 52 |
nakuḷa sahadeba śrīkhaṇḍī dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumana
mattagaja sāri ye tā’ra teja anargaḷā | 55 |
śalyakaiṁ boilā mohora ratha bāha bega
duje bīra bhīmasena nakuḷa sahadeba tini | 57 |
tebe se ḷāṇibunā mohora bhāroi malla bhīradhū
āja jībana na pāibe pāṇḍaba kuḷa sādhu | 58 |
śalye boiel kāḷaka tohora ẏehi bhāba
karṇṇa boilā śalya mohora dekha chatrīpaṇa
pāṇṭaba baḷa āja n auburibe ẏeka jāṇa | 60 |
karṇṇa boilā māmuṁ sākhā mātra hoi, tuhi mohora ratha bāhā
sārathi hoiṇa kemante tā kariba abagyaṁ | 62 |
akṣaẏe bhaṇḍāra bidhvaṁsili muṁ śrī sāroḷā caṇḍī prasāde | 67 |
ananta koṭi yuge bāḷuta rūpe kheḷi | 68 |
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni puṣkara bijaẏe ānande
kiñchita tīrtha gheni loṭe debīra padmapāde | 69 |
prāpata kara mote adahana bhūmi tiḷa arddhe
kiñchita bhagati hoili se debīra prasāde | 70 |
aruṇa candra ki aṁkita saẏaḷa jana byāpī | 71 |
badanti śudramuni sāroḷā dāsa pūroibā manabāñcchā | 72 |

div.head:
{@karṇṇārjuna yuddha o śrīkr̥ṣṇaṅka garbhamadhye arjunara
brahmāṇṭa sandarśana@}

lg.l: sedina dropatīra śuddhasrāhana bhīmasena śaẏana pāḷi
śrīkare arghya gheniṇa ubha hoile jighnasenī
śrīkr̥ṣṇa chamure bijaẏe jaṇaẏa ratnathāḷī gheni | 4 |
bhīmasenakaiṁ arghya dia go ānare kisa kāryya | 5 |
ẏe tohora pratagyāṁ sāchakari māna uddhariba | 6 |
dropati boile svāmī tu kaicchā jagajjeṭhī
ẏe bharahara bhārathe nātha taba namagoṭi | 7 |
tuhi se jagatanātha pāri karibunā mote | 8 |
āja yebe na upāṛibu dhuśāsanara bhūja
tohora mukha na chāhiṁbi agnire hoibi dahija | 9 |

div.note: dropatīra arghya gheniṇa debarāja |(gha, tha, ṅa, kha, na, ṭa, ṭha)
ẏetohara pratagyāṁ sāriba māna uddhāriba |(ṭa, jha, ka, ña)

āja yebe na upāḍibu dhuśāsanara bhmajaiṁ
tohora mukha na chāhiṁbi anna na bhmaṁjai |(ṭa, jha, ṅa)

lg.l: āja dhaśāsanaku tu na māribu yebe
saṁcaẏe biṣa khāi maribi satya satya ẏebe | 10 |
ābara chāri kare mora priojana kisa
tohora bāhāku āja muñ kari achaiṁ āśa | 11 |
yāa bābu āja raṇe tote dharma debatā heu sāhā
bhīmasena boilā go āja dina ṣe kadaṇḍara madhye
tāhāra aile tumbhe bahana hoi yiba | 14 |
sulabha bacana tohora mote hou parāpata
uttarā phālaguni nakṣatra bhogya se dinara | 16 |
taitiḷa nāme karaṇa ye dhr̥ti nāme yoga
prathama chāridaṇḍe yāiṁ samara bhūmi ghoṭi
karṇṇara sārathi śalya pārthara sārathi śrībaccha | 20 |
āho karṇṇara kare ye saturī sahasra baḷa dhanu
tāhā dekhi arjuna ye garukopa kalā
bāḷuta putranta mārila re tumbhe baḍa doṣī | 23 |
arjuna boile he karṇṇa nirddoṣī tumbhe aṭa
arjuna boilā re cauda baraṣara kumara abhimanyu
āpaṇe thāi marāilu se bāluta mora tanu | 25 |
ẏekapitā dui mātāuṁ jāta bhinnābhinna nāhiṁ ẏethira | 26 |
tu yetebeḷe āsi bijekalu he mahātamā | 27 |
āho karṇṇa ohokuḷaku tuhi se buṛāilu
karṇṇa boilā bābu samara dekha āja
timbura nārāja chedi karṇṇara ratha galā śatebheṛā ghuñchi | 33 |
puṇa dhātikāre śalya ratha ṭekilā āni pātha chamuṁ
karṇṇa praśaṁsai dhanya sārathipaṇa tohora māmuṁ | 34 |

div.note: “timbura nārāja chedi karṇṇara ratha galā śate bheṛā ghuñchi” (kha, na, ṭha,) adhikā pāṭha–:
sādhu sādhu boli śubhilā ākāśaru bāṇī

lg.l: karṇṇa śara pūrābante bajraśara binddhalā dhanurjaẏe
puṇihiṁ karṇṇa ratha ghuñchigalā śatebheṛā yāẏe | 35 |
puṇa sārathi ratha ṭekilā āṇi bege
cakṣu pichāḍibā mātrake hoilā nandighoṣa āge | 36 |
puṇi ghuñchigalā ratha se nārāja bighāte | 37 |
karṇṇa boilā māmuṁ ratha kiṁpā karu heḷa
mora ratha ghuñchiyāi kampāṁi na sambhāḷa | 38 |
śaile boile ho na ghuñchile tora ratha
chāri aśvaku chedantā niśce bīra pātha | 39 |
kopeṇa binddhala se ye nārāja parigha | 40 |

div.note: “puṇihiṁ karṇṇa ratha ghuñchigalā śatabheṛā yāẏe” kha, na, ṭha re adhika pāṭha :–
śateka nārāja ye binddhalā bīra karṇṇa
meghā śareka binddhalā ye bīrabara pātha
pabanā śare tāhā chedilā ādityara suta |

lg.note: heḷe nibārilā tāhā radheẏa tanuja |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)
lg.l: sādhu karṇṇa boli śubhilā ākāśare bāṇī
sādhu karṇṇa boli yahuṁ śrīhari kale śaṅkhadhuni
hātharu dhanu śahasra pakāilā bīra phālaguni | 43 |
guṇaghoṣa na śubhante śrīkr̥ṣṇa chāhiṁle leuṭi
kr̥ṣṇa boile karṇṇadarpe thambhībhūta hoilu ki kiraṭī | 44 |
ẏehikṣaṇi pāṇḍaba baḷa samasta dhvaṁsa kariyiba | 45 |
karṇṇara ratha ghuñchāili śate bheṛā sātabāra pariyante | 46 |
sādhu sādhu mote ta na boila śrībatsa | 47 |
sādhu karṇṇa boliṇa śubhilā svarga dhārā | 48 |
sādhu karṇṇa boliṇa kale jaẏe jaẏe | 49 |
śatra ku jaẏedhuni kala ta nārāẏaṇa
ẏe mohora dehare ki rahiba pañchuprāṇa | 50 |
lg.note: bābala śare tāhā chedilā bicitrabīryyara nāti |
karṇṇara ratha ghuñchāili śatebāra śatebheṛā pariyante (ka, jha, ñja, kha, gha, ja)

āre sātabhaṛā ghuñchilāka nandighoṣa
sādhu karṇṇa boli ye boile hr̥ṣīkeśa |(kha, ṭha, na)

lg.l: debatāṅku kopa tuho kalu ta na jāṇi | 51 |
mote ho bābu arjuna na karasi kopa
ẏe bhāratha yuddhe agocara mote karṇṇadarpa | 52 |
tuhi ẏehā tadanta kari nuāru dhanurjaẏe
karṇṇara ratha hāde śimuḷi tuḷā prāẏe | 53 |
cauda śaṅkha dadhimukha baḷa gheniṇa hanumanta yebaṇa rathadhvaje acchi uṭhi | 45 |
dekha ho phālaguni nandighoṣa ratha chāripīḍha bistāra
rathara dakṣiṇa koṇe dekha ho phālaguni
se stambhe rahiachanti īśvara debatā jāṇa | 57 |
rathara bāibya koṇe dekha ho sarbasācī
pabana debatā se stambhare bije kariacchi | 58 |
dekha ho arjuna rathara nairuta koṇe
hoi achanti ye ẏehu rathara juāḷi | 60 |
aśva yochā dauḍi ẏe hoichanti jāṇa | 61 |
ẏemāne tora rathe bākuli hoichantire bābā | 62 |
lg.note: ẏemāne tohora rathe bāhuka hoichanti re bābā |(ka, gha)
ẏemāne tohora rathe bāuḷi hoichanti bābā–pāṭhāntara
lg.l: śaṁkhapadma mahāpadma karkoṭaka, ananta, kuḷika, bāsukī takṣaka
ẏe rathaku ghuñchāila se ki dhanya nohe | 64 |
pātha boile dhanya boila he nāgaẏaṇa
ẏehā śuṇi kimpā dehe rahicchi mo prāṇa | 65 |
dekha ho arjuna boli bistārile tuṇḍa
dekhilā arjuna nārāẏaṇa garbhe aśeṣa brahmāṇḍa | 66 |
kāhiṁ nadī kāhiṁ giri kāhiṁ bana ghora
ẏe sakaḷa dekhi pātha hoilā kātara | 67 |
bichārai pātha tāra ratha keḍe garu | 68 |
sapata sāgara sapata brahmāṇḍa sapatadīpā mahī
bhāratha yuddha rāmāẏaṇa yuddha lāgiacchi tahiṁ | 69 |
kr̥ṣṇara garbhe arjuna ye dekhilā sabunti | 71 |
dekhiṇa bhāroi mallara na phurai kicchi | 72 |
arjuna boile hari āgocara tora māẏā
ẏebe se jāṇili hari pāṇḍaba kuḷaku tora ẏeḍe daẏā | 74 |
lg.note: dekhilā arjuna nārāẏaṇa garbhae sapata brahmāṇḍa |(jha, na, ṭa, ṭha, gha, kha, ṅa)

lg.head:
{@karṇṇa o yudhiṣṭhiraṅkara yuddha, yudhiṣṭhiraṅkara
apamāna o karṇṇara janma bibaraṇa@}

lg.l: dharmara nandana ye pūroi pañchu śara
puṇihiṁ nabaśara binddhale se kope ṭāṇi
puṇa dharme binddhale karṇṇaku āna dhanu dhari
dhanu dhari puṇa ye nārāja bindhanti | 8 |
bitrama siṁgha jāṇi se dhaile khaṛaga phaḷā | 10 |
hāboḍā śareka ye binddhalā radhebara suta
phaḷā bhāji uttānaśāẏi hoi rāẏe paṛile turite | 11 |
bāmakare keśa dhari ye kopeṇa śira jhuṇi
ṛāhāṇa kare khaṛaga dhariacchi se bāḷaarka jāṇi | 13 |
āre āre yujheṣṭhi tu āja mohora mukhare paṛilu
tohora muṇḍa āja re pakāibi kāṭi
āṣya debāku ẏebe tote kehi nohile sāmarathe | 17 |
karibi yebaṇa śāsi kr̥ṣṇa arjuna dekhu
trailokare ke pāru āja tote rakhu | 18 |
tiraṇa pramāṇe māẏeṁsa kāṭibi tora dekhantu debarāja | 19 |
kointāṁkara dujaputra hoi tu yujheṣṭhi nāma bahu
āmbhe lāghaba yuddhakaru tu dahija kathā kahu | 21 |
puṇa puṇa ātreṣi jhuṇai ye yujheṣṭhiṁkara bāḷa | 22 |
lg.note: ẏe duikuḷe pārile ke abā tote rakhu |(ṅa, tha)

catrakūṭa buddhire paśilu ture manda
tiraṇa pramāṇe śira āja karai re cheda |(ṭa, gha, ña, jha, cha)

kointāṁkar dujaputra hoijyeṣṭha nāma bahilu
āmbhe lāghaba yuddhakaru tu yuddhare pahija kalu |(ña)

lg.l: māgo debaartha kari ye āmbhanta jātakalu
jhiṁghāsa nakara karṇṇa ho mote khaṛaga gheni hāṇa
mohora iṣṭadebatā se kointā debī jāṇa | 25 |
bhala kahilu re tohora janma suphaḷa hāde | 27 |
rāgeṇa maṇi ta nagalā mote āu kicchi
pūrbe kointā debī mote ẏemāna mārāacchi | 28 |
jībana puṇa gheniṇa paḷā yā yujheṣṭhi
bahana hoi raṇabhūmi tejyākara na jāṇu dhr̥tirāṣṭi | 30 |
manare antara mote dhariba nā sehi | 31 |
ẏete boli karṇṇa ye chaḍilā yujheṣṭhiṁka keśa
śalya boile karṇṇa pratagyāṁ kathā kahu

lg.note: ke mohora iṣṭadebatā muṁ kointāṁkara śaraṇa | jha, ña, ṭa
abaśya maribi arjunaku kehu se rakṣākari |(ña, cha)

lg.l: yujheṣṭhiṁki dhari nele se siddha hontā sarbakāryya | 35 |
rakta māṁsa deha bahi sodara aṇatrodha | 36 |
karṇna boilā māmuṁ tu śuṇa pūrbakathā
tumbhe ta jāṇa āmbhara kointā nija katha | 37 |
ādityaṁka bīryyeṇa kointāẏe jāta kale mote | 38 |
lāje mote kointāẏe na nele bhmabanaku
mañjuṣe bhari yamunā nadīre melidile muku | 39 |
muhiṁ āsi lāgili hastināẏe batiśa sahasra yojane | 40 |
rādhā ye yāithile gaṅgā srāhāna nimante
kontabhoja rājāẏe ye pradāna kale kontāṁku
somabaṁśa rājā boli pradāna kale paṇḍu rājāṁku | 42 |
yujheṣṭhi nāma tāku dile kontī māta | 43 |
duja putraku yahuṁ dile jyeṣṭha nāma
jyeṣṭha nāma ghenimi muṁ yujheṣṭhiṁki māri
mohora tahiṁki āsile se sethira nimante | 46 |
kointāẏe doile āsa yibā pāṇḍabaṁka kati
muhiṁ boili māta go muhiṁ tohora jyeṣṭhaputra aṭai
tohora yujheṣṭhiki yebe muṁ māri pārai raṇe
jyeṣṭhaputra hoi tora muṁ basibi rājāpaṇe | 49 |
guru dakṣiṇā māgile mote kointā ṭhākurāṇī | 50 |
satya satya mātā go tu yāhā māgibu mote
abaśya debaiṁ go tohora kāryyara nimante | 51 |
kointāẏe boile guru dakṣiṇā debu muku
samare na māribu tu ye yujheṣṭhi bhīma nakuḷa sahadebaṁku | 52 |
arjunaku māra abā arjuna tote māru
ẏe chāriṁkari daśadoṣa aprādha kṣamā karu | 53 |
ẏe mohora satya meṇṭi pāribu yebe baḷe
karṇṇa boilā mātuḷa śuṇa deba śulya
śirāgrata hoicchi mote kointā mātāṁkara bola | 55 |
teṇu yujheṣṭhiṁki chaṛideli pūrbara yehne satye | 56 |
jāṇili yujheṣṭhi jiṇilā hārilā driyodhana raẏe | 57 |
śalya boile ẏeteka dhariachu yebe hr̥de
karṇṇa boilā mātuḷa ho bāhā mohora ratha
ājara samare muṁ maribi kr̥ṣṇa pātha | 59 |
yujheṣṭhi debaṁku tahiṁ na pāile apāra | 61 |
yujheṣṭhi deba ṭhākuraṁku ye karṇṇa keśa dhari nelā | 62 |
khaṇḍā bulāi karṇṇa rāgeṇa keśa dhari jhuṇi
kontā rakha rakha boli yujheṣṭhi deba dile ṛāka
chādilāka keśa karṇṇa kariṇa dhika dhika | 64 |
abhimāna pai deba na rahile samare
āmbhara āsibā yāẏe samara thāa maṇḍi | 68 |
śrīhari boile tu āho śuṇasi śrīkhaṇḍī
āmbhara āsibā yāẏe samara thāa maṇḍi | 69 |
yujheṣṭhi deba ye ẏethu gale abhimāne
ratharu ohlāiṇa ye yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara kati
āsa āsa arjuna muṁ arghya bandāibi tuku
karṇṇa māri ailu ki mohora chamuku | 74 |
pātha boilā deba tohora abhimāna śuṇi
yujheṣṭhi boile re dhika dhika bīra pātha
āre keteka abastā dilā mote karṇṇa mahāratha | 76 |
yete kaṣṭa dilā tāhā kaibaiṁ kete
keśa dhari jhaṇilā mote benidaṇḍa pariyante | 77 |
puṇa trodheṇa yujheṣṭhi bolanti śuṇa he gobinde
bābu kontāẏe śaraṇa boli boili yetebeḷe
tebe se chaḍilā mote dr̥saha kaṭāḷe | 79 |
tohora parā bhāi thāuṁ mohora ẏeṛe kaṣṭa
tu kemante deha dhari achure pāpiṣṭha | 80 |
āre āre arjuna tohora jībana dhika hou
āre debadatta śaṅkha bahu, gāntima ye dhanu puṇi
micheheṁ pahija karu ture apāra kari kahu
kiraṭī mukuṭa poḍu tohroa ẏemāna kiṁpā bahu | 84 |
dhika dhika tora sakhā ye sārathi catrapāṇi
re kr̥ṣṇa māṁsa tora khaure gr̥dhaṇī | 85 |
paśupatra nārāja tora akṣaẏe troṇa beni
kope khaṛaga ye dhaila bīra pātha
hara pāboṅgti dile mote paśupatra akṣaẏe ye troṇa | 93 |
muhiṁ bolai svamī ẏe paśupatra akṣaẏe troṇaku ye nindā karai
puṇihiṁ boili yebe muhiṁ nuāribi māri
agni jāḷi māribi ẏe satya satya mohori | 95 |
lg.note: pada ṭhāru 95 madhyare pāṭhāntara o adhikā pāṭha :–
prapañcha kathā tote kahai hari puṇa |
svāmī yebaṇa kāḷe muṁ ẏekā gali banabāsakaiṁ
kirāta rūpa dhari muhiṁ banaste bulai |
lalāṭe sīmasthāne ye guñjarā māḷamāna bhūṣaṇa |
svāmī baiśākha māsa śukaḷa pakṣa pañchamī bhaumabāra
punarbasu nakṣatra ye aṭai se dinara |
bāḷaba nāme karaṇa ye atigaṇḍa nāme yoga
sehi dine bane trīṛā ye karanti harapārbatī
se gaṇḍā pāṇi khauthilā gaṅgāra bhitara |
īśvara chamure paṛi gaṇḍā chāḍilā parāṇa |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: yadyapi yujheṣṭhiṅki hari kariba hāde rakṣā
muhiṁ agni jāḷi paiśbi abaśya ẏe mohora kaicchā | 97 |
lg.note: agrabr̥kṣa mūḷe hara pārbatī tha(?)le basi
śarīre sahasra ghāta pāiṇa gaṇḍā chāmure paḍilā āsi |
īśvara boile re ke mohora gaṇḍā māri
puṇihiṁ boile brahmā biṣṇu indra hoile
biṣṇu nindā kalāku muṁ sahi nuārili
muṁ gaṇḍā māili boli bāhāra hoili |
muhiṁ na jāṇai se īśvara pārbatī |
rāge boile śabarā re ghenibaiṁ tohara prāṇa
muhiṁ boili tote prāne na māribi
ẏe sundarī trodha muṁ kemante sahibi |
ke rakṣā kariba tote ghora bipina |
ẏe sundara bhārija bidhabā heba akāraṇe
rāme boili śabarare ghenibaiṁ to jībana
pārbatī parāẏe bhārijā bidhabā hoiba akāraṇa |

lg.l: ẏe paśupatra śara akṣaẏa troṇa sabuyiba | 98 |
tohora beḷe tāhāṁku hoai ki saṁhāri | 99 |
lg.note: prāṇe na māribi boli hara kaṇṭhe lagāili dhanuhuḷa
antarīkṣa mārge bulāili deba ye suḍhaḷa |
dekhi bhaẏa jāta ye hoilā mo manara |
rakate jara jara diśai tāra kāẏe
āre re śabara chaḍa māgasi mote bara
śuṇi āścaryya hoi kāḍhi āṇili dhanuhuḷa |
boile bāoḷuta ture baḍa kalu manda |
ṛare bara dele ki hoiba kāryyasiddhi |
pārbatī boile svāmī yebe deba bara
puṇa pārbatī boile kisa bara māgibu ho pātha
muhiṁ boili ki bara māgibi kaha tumbhe māta |
tripura andhaka hara badhakale yebaṇa bāṇe
se paśupatra māga tote trailoke jiṇantā nohuṁ kehi raṇe |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: ẏe trailoke muṁ na jiṇili kāhā | 100 |
svāmī śare śare sāgara muṁ bānddhali setubandhe
amara svarge yāiṁ jiṇili deba sahasrākṣa | 104 |
khāṇḍebe bana dahana kari dilaiṁ mauṣadhi | 105 |
baḷe pradāna hoili muṁ ulupī citrāṅgadā | 106 |
nabadīpa sapata sāgara dhaili dhanu huḷe | 109 |
svāmī kirāta rūpeṇa bane jiṇili muṁ hara

lg.note: muhiṁ boili paśupatra śara mote debāka paśupati
īśvare boile ẏehā ki kahile pāboṅgti |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: kaurobanta jiṇili muhiṁñ birāṭa rājye thili ye godhana haraṇe
kete jhiṁghāsa tahiṁ na pāile bhīṣma droṇe | 113 |
subāhu nāmeṇa muhiṁ ye māili kauṇopa
āho caitana apāra prakāre pratijñā yahuṁkale sarbasācī
svāmī śaraṇa ye paśi abaśya muṁ tāhākaiṁ rakhi | 115 |
lg.note: satyakari kaha ẏehā kahila ke tote |
tāha śuṇi muiṁ ye boilaiṁ bacana
muṁ kisa kahibi tume sarbagyāṁtā trilocana |
īśvara boile arjuna tu ye āmbhara śiṣya puta
tote bara deli muṁ santoṣa hoi citta |
hara boile pārbatī go kahila mora tathya
tumbhe bara deba nāhiṁki go hoila ẏehāṁkara māta |
śauca hoiṇa bara dia go begakari
maẏeṁṣāsura badhakale debī akṣaẏe troṇa gheni |
causāṭhī yoginī mūḷe bindhu chanti śara |
ẏemāne dhanu dhari bindahnti ye śara
tāhā dekhi aṅgaru durgā roma upāṛile
lakṣe baraṣa yuddhale śara goṭiẏe nasarai (abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: ātmā praśaṁsā ẏe tora ātmāku maraṇa samāna | 116 |
arjunaku daẏā tu kara go ṭhākurāṇī | 120 |
lg.note: tahuṁṇa pārbatī aile ye nadīru srāhana sāri
māgare bara arjuna boli boile ādinārī |
muhiṁ boili māgo pāibi ye kāraṇa
prasanna hela yebe diasi akṣaẏa troṇa |
toṣeṇa se troṇa mote dileka girijā
boile svāmī mandakr̥tya kala he debarājā
puṇi boile yebe tote akṣaẏe akṣaẏe troṇa diāile tripurāri
śate īśvara hoile tote nohibe samasari |
hara pārbatī ye mote satya bacana bhāṣi
īśvara boile ẏe śaraku ye kariba jhiṁghāsa
brahmā indra biṣṇu hoile abaśya karibu bināśa |
muhiṁ boili yebe na pārai māri
agni jāḷi paśibi satya satya mohori |

*“īśvara boile ture śuṇasi phālaguni” ṭhāru “pārbatīṁki ture
akṣaẏe troṇa māga” paryyanta pāṭha kebaḷa “cha” pothire acchi |
lg.l: yujheṣṭhi debe ye kale dhikāra bacana
akṣaẏe troṇa paśupatra nindā kaleka puṇa | 121 |
ẏe doṣaku kṣamā ye kariba śūḷahasta
triputi hoiṇa se bāṇaku āgyāṁ dile
arjunara troṇe tumbhe yāi thāasi boile | 124 |
puṇi āsi sehi arajuna pāśare rahile | 125 |
nārāẏaṇe boile tu śuṇa ho arajuna
sābadhāne bīra śuṇa muṁ kahai bacana | 126 |
tuhi ye boilu muṁ ye agni dahija hoibi
ātmā praśaṁsā maraṇaku sari hoilā bāsebi | 127 |

lg.head:
{@bhīma duḥśāsana yuddha o prathama yuddhare bhīmasenaṅkara
parājaẏa@}
lg.l: śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
śrīkr̥ṣṇa arjuna ye yujheṣṭhi hāde tini
gadābara bulaiṇa prahāra kalāka bīra rathe
ratha cūra hoigalā aśva sārathi sahite | 6 |
āho caitana somadatta kare pañchāśasahasra baḷa dhanu
śateka nārāja binddhalāka se mahīdāsara tanu | 8 |
re re kāra śabada kariṇa ye bhīmasena uṭhi
kumbhasthaḷe paṛi hāthī hoilā śate khaṇḍa
piṭante ratha gaja huanti sarbe cūra | 12 |

lg.note:
gajara kumbhasthaḷa ye hoilā śatekhaṇḍa
raṇa chaṛi rāẏe luchāile piṇḍa |(ṭa, ja, ca)

lg.l: sanya hata dekhiṇa ye dr̥pada nandana
āho caitana śrīkhaṇḍi dhuśāsana duhiṁkari uddaṇḍa samara
cauṣaṭhi bauṣaṭhi bhāra gadā gheniṇa bīra benikare
bole bhīṣmaṁka śatr̥ se tu paḍalu mohora chamure | 22 |
re re kāra kariṇa garji prahāra kala mahākope | 23 |
abirate kari muhiṁ bhīmāku loṛu thili
tāhākaiṁ na pāi tote re muṁ bheṭa ye pāili | 24 |
gadā bulābanteṇa se ulu kāpāta jāṇi
śrīkhaṇḍira rathe tāha prahāra kalā āṇi | 25 |
śrīkhaṇḍī haẏe sārathi helā sarba cūnā | 26 |
rāhura teja prāẏe sāṁgrāme bikāśai tāra dehī | 27 |
brāhmaṇa kṣatrī ādikari paḍai ye tāhāra sammukhe
goḍāi piṭai sanya se gaḷānti nirekhe | 28 |
dhaiṁṇa dhuśāsana ye dhailā tāra hātha
bhmaṣaṇḍi uchuṛiṇa nelā se gāndhārīra suta | 30 |
beni khaṇḍa hoiṇa se cchiṇḍilā tāra kaẏe
niprohi prahāra se kalāka śahasra gheni
dhūśāsana mūrati dekhi bhajile sarba saini | 34 |
bhīmasena boilā āre āre dhūśāsana acchi kāhiṁ
āre yatane tāhāku loḍi na pāilita muhiṁ | 36 |
dhūśāsana āge bhīmasenaku bheṭa karāilā pratacche | 37 |
re re bhīmā boli hākai dhūśāsana bīra
candrakaiṁ dekhiṇa yehne rāhura teja parakhara | 38 |
giribara sādriśe diśai tāhāra ye kāẏe
āre āre pāṇḍabā boli ḍākai gāndhārī tanaẏe | 39 |
bāḷuta bhāinta mor amarilu kāli raṇe
kaneṣṭanta badha kalu re kisa baḍapaṇe | 40 |
āre bhīmā etekāḷe āsi paṛilu mora mukha
yābata kāḷe tumbhe samasta dharma gheni | 44 |
lg.note: kaneṣṭanta badhakalure kisa mandapaṇe |(tha, ṅa, ṭa)

lg.l: biṣalaṛu dei se māri loṛuthila muku | 45 |
biṣalaḍu bhmañjante śarīre biṣa ghārilā yetebeḷe
bāndhi pelidela neire agādha sindhu jaḷe | 46 |
gokharā bāhmaṇa ye purañjana paṇḍā hāthe
āpane gadāe māilu re cauda baraṣara tanu | 49 |
kahante na saraire tumbhara dharmara āchāra | 50 |
bibasana kalu nei ye rājāra sabhātaḷe | 52 |
se dinu keśa ye abandhana jīghnasenī
tote loḍi napāili muṁ māili aneka saini | 53 |
āja se bandhana hoiba dropatīra keśagoṭi | 54 |
bhīmasena ratha sārathi haẏe hoileka bhagna | 58 |
bāuna bāuna bhāra gadā bhīmasenara duihāthe
kehi ka hākaiṁ puṇa nohanti ye uche | 70 |
dhuśāsna prahāra ye kalā bhīmasena māthe | 71 |
āho caitana benibīre gadā prahārante gaḷagāji
āho caitana arajuna prabeśa hoilā āsi bege
hāthīra kumbhasthaḷe bāji nādighara bāṭe galā phūṭa | 79 |
prāṇa bisarjjilā ye suhastā nāme hāthī
rāgadarpe rahiacchi rāuta na paṛai kṣiti | 80 |
arjuna boilā prāṇa rahiacchi hāthī tanu | 81 |
mr̥tyu hāthī upare somadatta karai śarabr̥ṣṭa
puṇi gobinda boile kaurobe dhani dhani
nāhim ẏemanta na dekhilā satya tretaẏā dvāpara yugatini | 85 |
gobinde boile ho dekha dekha bīra pārtha
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile arjuna hāthī malā rāutara prāṇa nāhiṁ
rāga darpa kari jāṇa duheṁ achantiṭi rahi | 90 |
ẏethaku praśaṁsā kehne na karibe trailokye
ke ẏethe amara hoi rahiacchi ihaloke | 91 |
sadhu sādhu somadatta boli boile sarbasācī | 92 |
gobinde boile ho tumbhara āja kāhiṁ yuddha
duhiṁkari paṛitāḷe dhuśāsana gadā hoilaka cūnā | 101 |
āho raitana śūnyahātha hoiṇa dhuśāsana ghuñchi
āre raha raha dhūśāsana boli bhīmasena ṛākuacchi | 102 |
muthe muthe paṛitāḷa hoanti ye beni
muthe mutha paṛitāḷa ye karanti benibaḷī
bhmajeṇa bhmaja bhiḍi śireṇa śira paṛitāḷa
samara karante yehne mahī houcchi ṭaḷamaḷa | 110 |
doheṁ diśuchanti ye yāmaḷā br̥kṣa prāẏe | 113 |

div.note:
bhmaḷe bhmaja bhiṛābhiṛi muṇḍe muṇḍa koḍakoṛi
uṭhilā bahani ye jaḷilā banagiri |(ḍa, tha, ga, ṛa)

lg.l: mandaragiri prāẏe doheṁ basundharī dehe byāpi | 116 |
karddane dhūḷi hoi ye uḍanti ākāśe | 117 |
gaṛanti paṛanti duheṁ tahiṁ ye na rahanti ānajana | 118 |
ubhaẏa baḷa thāṭha ye gale ghuñchikari
satara sahasra kaḷi dhokaḍi kākhareṇa yāki
lāgu lāgu boli mahatamā kāmarūpī ṛākī | 122 |
rathagaja aśva br̥kṣe caṛhi dekhuchanti sakaḷa sanyamāna | 124 |
parbate ṭaḷa ṭaḷa hoile ye muṣṭighāta dekhi | 125 |
paḍanti uṭhanti bhiṛanti jhāṁkatni ye dharanti

div.note:
lāgalāka kandaḷa ye dusaha kaṭaḷa
ānande nācanti tahiṁ brahnāṅkara bāḷa |(kha, na, ṭha)
pādabhare rodhir abahai basundhara |(ṭa, gha, ta, ḍha)

lg.l: ke abā chāhiṁ rahiba dekhuṁ dekhuṁ lāge bhrānti
kuhu kuhu phuphu kāra dhuni prakāśanti | 131 |
māṛiṇa basila se chatrī māna maradana | 134 |
kaṭi mekhaḷe caraṇa bhidi bāmakare māḍai toṭi
kopeṇa dhuśāsana boilā āre āre bhīmā
bāḷuta bhāinta māri tu dekhāilu gārimā | 137 |

div.note:
bāhāspoṭa paritāḷe chāpanti asthi bhañji
kālatroṭa naẏane chāhānti begi begi |(ba, ḍha)

lg.l: dropatīki aṇā āre tora pakhāḷa tāra keśa
bāḷa na bāndhilā acchi ye caudabaraṣa chaṛamāsa | 140 |
puṇa puṇa prāhara karai dakṣiṇa se pāṇi
re re pāṇḍabā tu micheheṁ bolāu yodhī
re re pāṇḍabā tu buṛāilu ẏeṛeka sampradhi | 142 |
re re pāṇṭabā tu āṣya thāuṁ thāuṁ maru
re re pāṇḍabā āja tote kehuṭi rakṣākaru | 143 |
re re pāṇḍabā purilā tohara āiṣa
re re pāṇḍabā āja kāṭibaiṁ tora māṁsa | 144 |
re re pāṇḍabā sumara tohora pitāmātā
re re pāṇḍabā sumara tohora iṣṭa ye debatā | 145 |
re re pāṇḍabā tu bolāu kaicchā jagajjeṭhī
re re pāṇḍabā tora tiraṇa pramāṇe maẏeṁsa kāṭi | 146 |
re re pāṇḍabā tohora asaṁkhya mahimā
re re pāṇḍabā nāma tohora buṛilare bhīmā | 147 |
re re pāṇḍabā tu śaraṇa pañjara bīradhu
re re pāṇḍabā ẏebe hoilu asādhu | 148 |
re re pāṇḍabā ẏebe śutilu raṇamajhi
re re pāṇḍabā yamadebatā pocchilā tora pāñji | 149 |
re re pāṇḍabā brikodara goṭi tohāra ye nāma
re re pāṇḍabā tuhinā bolāi dutīyama | 150 |
re re pāṇḍabā kāḷebara tohora gadā
re re pāṇḍabā tohora pratagyāṁ na rahi sarbadā | 151 |
re re kāra kariṇa dhūśā ūṭhilā gaḷagāji
āre āre pāṇḍbā tu kimpā śutilu ākhibuji | 152 |
dusaha pratagyaṁ ye beḷaku beḷa ṭāṇa
śalya śaṁkuni karṇṇa māna ye gobinda
ẏe kurubaḷa uddhāraṇa tuhi se jagabandhu | 157 |
aneka sānande bolai rājā manaye gobinda
śakuṁni bolāi ho thira hua kaurobe
mānagobinde boile āu jībante nāhiṁ bhīmā
ābara ki aprate karibā dhuśāsna mahima | 160 |
sada sampradhi āja dilaka mohora bhāi
yujheṣṭhire kisa priojana nakuḷa sahadeba gheni | 162 |
nagre ucchaba ye karāa mohora āja
āho caitana śatr̥ jita pātāṅga saburathe bānddhale kaurobe
āhā sodara re tu budāilu bibhūti sabunti | 165 |
bābu aneka rākṣāsa ye badhakalu kauṇopa
kiñchita doṣe nāśa gala re mohora bāpa | 166 |
anāstara nātha mora keuṁṇa kati galu
bābu yāhāra nāma dharante trāsa karai yama
koṭiẏe koṭiẏe siṁghara prākarma yebaṇa baḷarāma | 168 |
se tote sari re nohile saṁgrāma
tuhi se bābu aṭu baḷare baḷī bhīma | 169 |
bābu andheka bibāde kapiḷāsa sarga rakhi
bābu debaṁku dullabha re yāhāra mahiṁmā
mohora pāpakarmare nāśagalu re bīra bhīma | 171 |
hā hā svāmi mora kāḷadaṇḍa gadaguru
yama argaḷi bhāṁjai nātha taba nāma dharu | 173 |
svāmi baḷarāma darpa harilu sohodrā haraṇe
svāmi kumbhirī kinnarī ādi baka hiḍimbaka
ẏehānta badhilu tribhmabana madhye mahimā kalu ṭeka | 179 |
śrī nārāẏaṇaṁka tahuṁ lua bahai beniākhi | 180 |

div.note: gobinda maunabrata na phurai kicchi |(kha, ta, na, tha, ṅa)
“śrī nārāẏaṇaṁka tahuñ lua bahai beniākhi” pare
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile bhīma chaḍi keṇe galu

lg.l: yahuṁ trodha abasthā hoile śrī basudeba
kahani re bābu tuhi ẏethira tadanta | 183 |
pāṇḍabakuḷa uddharaṇa ẏekā aṭai bīra bhīmā
yebaṇa jārāsandha aṣṭādaśa beḷa āmbhanta dilā dhāḍi | 185 |
tāhāra mahimā ke kahite ki pāri
mathurā madhubana chaḍili gomanta ādi tāhāra bhaẏe kari | 186 |
lakṣe rājā mahuḍamaṇi ye ẏehi mahīmaṇḍaḷe
tāhāṁku badhakalā bhīmā pāñchadaṇḍa ye madhyare | 187 |
śahasra dharithile kṣaṇake jiṇipārai ẏe tinijagata | 189 |
brikodara mūrttiki ye mahā br̥ndāarke trāsi | 191 |
tohora āṣya ẏebe puṇa keuṁṇa mahātamā | 192 |
kr̥ṣṇakaiṁ pratibākya dile dharmarāja ye yujheṣṭhi | 193 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile mādrī prāṇatyāja houchanti yetebeḷe
boile bāḷuta agyāna ẏe mohora putra duigoṭi
hari sehi kathāgoṭi muhiṁ dhariacchi hr̥de
ẏehāṁka abhimāna muṁ kṣaṇeka na sahai hāde | 196 |
hari kumbhirī daitaku ẏehāṁku deuthile hāde koẏentī
bhīmāku dei muṁ se rakṣākali ẏehānti | 197 |
svāmi araṇye jaḷa heri gale chāribhāi
bhīma arajuna nakuḷa teji muṁ ẏehānta jīāiṁ | 198 |
hari kontā ye loḍigale bakadatyaku debāku
svāmi ẏehāra caritamāna muhiṁ jāṇilaiṁ ẏebe
mohora carita prāẏe hari he bujhiṇa muhiṁ thili
ẏebe se jāṇili ẏehāṁka carita abhāba boli | 201 |
hari bhīmā nāśagale āura na bratai muhiṁ
ẏe doheṁ yāi paśibe mānagobindara thāṭhaiṁ
muhiṁ jāṇili ẏehāṁkara bāñcchā ẏeheneka aṭai | 203 |
karapatra yoḍi ye bolai mantrī cuḍāmaṇi | 204 |
śuṇa deba ananta nārāẏaṇa deba dharme
dhuśāsana chara darpe ki nāśayibe bīra bhime | 205 |
svāmi kontabhoja rājāṁkara tinisahasra pañchatiriśa aṁke,
āradrā nakṣatra ye aṭai se dinare | 207 |
boile muṁ tohora rājyare rahibi caturmāsyā | 208 |
semāna cintākari mote na aṇṭai dibārāti | 209 |
raha boile tote bhagati hoi na pāribi
yāa boile ta tumbhara kopeṇa nāśayibi | 210 |
drbhā sāẏe boile tu rājya cintākara
dohitā goṭiẏe deithibu se thiba āmbha sannidhyara | 211 |
se āmbhanta anubrate khaṭithiba sakaḷa kari paritejyā
kuntabhoje boile māgo tu durbhā sāṁka caraṇe anubrate thibu khaṭi
brahmāra samāne se muni tote kāraṇa karibeṭi| 213 |
durbhasāẏe boile āmbhe rahiluta tohora kaṭake nababaraṣa yāẏe | 217 |
baḍa susthahoi rahilu ho acinte nibhrānti | 218 |
kontabhoja boile muni he mohroa rājyadhani
pacheṇa goṛāi achanti kontā bhojara nandanī | 221 |
kointā boile muṁ bahuta dina caraṇe sebākali
durbhāsāẏe boile tu kicchi na māgu āmbhaṁku
brahmā rudra indra ādi prāpata hoibāka tote | 226 |
boile ẏe ruṣiṁkara bola sata kibā micha
dekhi biḍibā nā āja ẏehiṭhāre pratakṣa | 228 |
udaẏa giri ki se meru pradakṣiṇa
dinakara nātha boile abhiḷāṣa debu go kointā
tu yebe āmbhanta mane kalu āgo cintā | 231 |
lājeṇa na nele se ye pitāra gharaku
mr̥ttikā mañjuṣe bhari pelile se yamunā jaḷaku | 233 |
rādhebī pāi tāhā pāḷiba ati yatane | 234 |

div.note: mr̥ttikā mañjuṣe bhari pelile se gaṅgā bhitaraku |(ka, cha, ja)

kointā melidile manohara nāme bane
karṇṇa lāgilāka yāi hastinā bhmabane |(tha. ṅa.)

lg.l: paṇḍu dhr̥tirāṣṭra ye aṭanti dui bhrātha | 235 |
ẏemāne bichāri rājā kale ye paṇḍuṁku
ye bichāra na yogāilā dhr̥tirāṣṭraṁka manaku | 237 |
duje bibhā hoile paṇḍu ye nr̥pati
ahaṁbhāba dekhi dhr̥tirāṣṭre rājya deiṇa se śataśr̥ṅge kale sthiti | 238 |
daiba baśuṁ kari se brahmahatyā kale | 239 |
baṁśa rakṣā karite tumbhara acchiṭi ki nandana | 243 |
yama boile yebe ẏeka bhāriyāke nohile santati
putrabantī kanyā dekhi kimpe bibhā nohila ho mahāyati | 245 |
tahiṁre putra ye janma kari nuārilu | 246 |

div.note:
agnikā mahāruṣi boile puṇi helu bibhā
tebeheṁ santāna nohilā śuṇa jantudebā |(ka, da)

lg.l: yamadebatā boile putrabantī śuddha srāhāna kāḷe
dhana dei śr̥ṅgāra kimpā nakala setebeḷe | 247 |
ruṣi boile tāhā muṁ bahuta ye kali
yama boile muni he paraputra goṭiẏe
dhana dei kiṇiāṇi pradāna na kala kimpe svaṁẏe | 249 |
ruṣi boile dhana dei kiṇi putragoṭiẏe poṣilu
yama boilā āpaṇā bhāriyānta parathāne peṣi
tahuṁ kimpāi bīryya na kiṇilu maharuṣi | 251 |
para puruṣe kimpāi na karāilu ẏekata | 252 |
parapuruṣa bīryya na rahilā patnīki pacharilu | 253 |
yamadebatā boile ẏe chaḍaprakāre yebe nohilā santati
mañchare mukha chāhiṁ svargare na basai sehi | 255 |
sabhāra madhye na basai sehu jana
yamadebatāra āgyāṁẏe dūte neleka bāḷa dhari
dharmapuruṣe boile uttama brāhmaṇa ẏe aneka kalā dharma
āu ẏeka janma ẏehāku chaḍidia āho yama | 258 |
gcaṛidia putra jāta arthe mañchare hoantu parabeśa | 259 |
yama boilā putra hoi yemanta nāśayāi
putra bratithāi se piṇḍadāna debā arthe | 261 |
tebe se kāraṇa karai sapata puruṣa
se tāta jananī tarai svargapure bāsa | 262 |
se janmara kāraṇa tebe sehu pāi
putra puṇya phaḷeṇa puṇa mañchare janmahoi | 263 |
dāna yagyāṁ br̥tti na yāu ẏehāra nāśa
ẏebe yāiṁ maharuṣi santāna jātare paśa | 266 |
dharma parāẏaṇa loke ruṣiṁki peṣiṇa ye dile
svarguṁ patana hoi muni mr̥garūpa dhaile | 267 |
mr̥guṇīra hr̥de kartti chaichāḍe galā phuṭi | 272 |

div.note: rauraba narkare ẏehāku pakāa nei jhāti |(ka, ja, a, ṅa)
iṣiṇī o iśāṇī prabhr̥ti nāma pothimānaṅkare miḷuacchi |

lg.l: rāgeṇa agnikā maharuṣi tahiṁ śāpa diẏe | 273 |
adoṣe ye mote ture ẏehenneka kr̥tya kalu
tohora śr̥ṅgāra kāḷe akāḷa kāṇḍa paṛu | 274 |
sahadeba boilā svāmi agnika maharuṣira śāpe
ẏemante āhuṭa satara baraṣa tahiṁ galā
kointā mādrī tāhāṁkara beni ye bhāriyā
mohora ta tumbhare ratiraṅga nāhiṁ agnikā maharuṣira śāpe
baṁśa rakṣā nimante tumbhe santāna jātakara gopye | 278 |
bhāriyānta boile tumbhe jāra puruṣa kara
rātra dibase paṇḍu rājāẏe bhāriyānta tiāri
bolai na kale se patiba tā nārī | 280 |
paṇḍura brahmahatyā doṣa phiṭibaṭi tumbhara putra jātakale | 281 |
byāsa mahāyati yahuṁ ẏemanta boile bāṇī
byāe boile patira āgyaṁre pare kara rati
aputra ka goṣa na lāgiba svargare basiba paṇḍu mahārāṇa | 284 |

div.note:
ṛūṣi mr̥guṇī se jaḍita hoithile
rāgeṇa agnikā maharuṣa tahi śāpadile |(ṭa. gha. ca. ja. ja)
bola nakale se baraṣa śatachāri |(ca, gha, ṭa, ka, ja, ba, ta)

lg.l: śeyyāra yugate japāmāḷī gheni se debī ye kointā
sannidhye prabeśa āsi hoile dharma nirākāra
puṇa sumarile se ye pabana debatāṁku
prasanne pabanedeba āsi prapata hoile kointāṁku | 290 |
maruta debatā bīryye putreka hoilā jāta
koḷa kari dhaile kointā debī māta | 291 |
parbata taḷe ye byāghreka dila raḍi | 292 |
śataśiṁga parbata ye śate yojana sthaḷī
putrara bhārā pāiṇa se pātāḷare gaḷi | 294 |
sāta sāta yojaan tahiṁra dīrgha prati | 295 |
bāma pādara kāṇi aṅguji bāji śiṁgeka galā bhaganasta | 296 |
se parbat auparu ye bahai śroṇita
kopeṇa śāpya dilā se śataśiṁga parabata | 297 |
prathamahuṁ tu ye mote kalu pāda prahāra
āre āre bhīmā tu prathama yuddhe hāra | 298 |
kontāẏe boile manda kalu tu acaḷa
kointāẏe boile muhiṁ tote debi śāpa
giribara boilā mā go mote na karibā kopa | 300 |
yebaṇa śāpa deli muṁ tohora putraku
abaśya phaḷiba kopa nakara tu muku | 301 |
prathama yuddhe hāriba go tohora putra bhīma | 302 |
duja samare yebe go sumariba mote
brikodara mūrati hoiba baḷa siṁgha śate | 303 |
duja yuddhe jiṇima go tohora kumara | 304 |
sahadeba boile svāmi tu jagujana bandhu
tu kāhā na jāṇu deba jāṇu jāṇu kāndu | 305 |
svāmi bhīmasena ṭhākuraṁku ye śataśiṁgara acchi śāpa
svāmi mahā sāṁgrāmara bhoḷe se na cetai kicchi
tu deba detanā karāa bhīmasena ṭhākuraṁku

div.head:
{@duḥśāsana badha o draupadīṅkara
beṇī bandhana@}

lg.l: āho caitana śrīhari kale pañchu janya śaṅkhaśabada
śataśiṁga śataśiṁga boli uñche kale sehu nāda | 1 |
ẏeka uttara śate siṁghara hoilā prākarma | 3 |
brikodara rūpa dhari leuṭāi māḍi basi
naẏana chaṭake bhīmā māḍi basilā ātreṣi | 4 |
āho caitana māẏādhara puruṣara māẏā kūṭabuddhi
mandara māḍi basilā yehne himagiri parbata
sehi sādr̥śe māḍi basila pabanara suta | 9 |
raṇaraṅga hāndoḷa se achargaḷa bīra bhīmā

div.note:
garjai bīra bhīma śatasiṁghara prāẏe
atīẏa tama tāhāra kahaṇā na yāẏe ||(ta, tha, ṅa)

lg.l: ẏeka uttara śate siṁghara yāhāka prākarma
ohobaḷa thāṭhaku chāhiṁ bulāi cakṣu antarāḷa | 14 |
re re kāra śabada kari garjai kāmarūpī | 15 |
āja se muhiṁre tote dekhite pāili| 23 |
yetebeḷaku āṣya re achai nirbāṇa kari
ke tāha puṇa puṇa āna karipāri | 24 |
nimiṣeke āṣya thile ke nāhiṁ re laṁghantā
kālika āẏuṣa tote re bañchāilā bidhātā | 25 |
āja dhuśāsana re paḍilu mohora mukha
āja se pāragalā re dropatīra dukha | 26 |
āre āre kauroba re mahiṁmā tora dhani
ke āja tote rakṣā karipārai medinī | 27 |
karai bīra pratagyāṁ re kehu tote āja rakhu | 28 |
ājhuṁ nirimākhī hoilā re rājā mānagobinda | 29 |
tuhi pārile rakṣākara ho deba indre | 31 |
tuhi pārile rakṣākara dhuśāsana hoilā anāsta | 32 |
ābara candra sūryya brahmā rudra ādikari
samare miḷantu ke āsi kareṇa śasra dhari | 33 |
āre āre dhuśāsana kehi rakhi nuārile tuku
puṇa kope chāhiṁlā bhīma pātāḷa bhmabanaku | 35 |
bāsukī ananta takṣaka ke pāra dhuśāsanaku āsi rakha | 36 |
he aṣṭakuḷā nāme tumbhe aṭa baḷabanta | 37 |
karucchi pratagyāṁ tumbhemāne pārile kehi rakha | 38 |
āre āre kaurobe karṇṇa śalya śakuni
tumbhe rathīmāne thāānte dhuśāsana hoilā nirekha | 41 |
ke pāra dhuśāsanaku jībana dāna dei rakha
ẏetaka sodara thāuṁ kiṁpe dhuśāsana hoilā nirekha | 42 |
bhīmasena boila karṇṇa tu parā bhārathe bhāroi malla
chatrī kr̥tānteka tumbhe parā rāẏeguru śalya | 43 |
apacaẏa kāḷaku kehu saṁpakṣa ye nohila | 44 |
asamaẏa kālaku ta sakhā kehi noha
āre āre dhuśāsana kehi rakhi nuārile tuku
āre re pāṇḍabe tumbhe yujheṣṭhi dhr̥ṣṭa ye dr̥mane
pāru yebe tu rakṣā kara he chatrībara arjuna
śarīra kampai arjunara bhīmasenara bacana śuṇi | 50 |
arjuna boilā deba bhīmara muṇḍa muṁ pakāibi hāṇi | 52 |
puṇa puṇa pratagyāṁ kalā debe ye yujheṣṭhi
tāhāhiṁ sahili deba ati utakarma bāki | 54 |
svāmi tohora garbhe dekhili mahī nabakhaṇḍa
ke tote samāna acchi brahmāṇḍa khaṇḍa tini
toteheṁ pratagyāṁ kalā se pāmara agyānī | 56 |
chāḍa chaḍa keśaba pakāibi bhīmasenara muṇḍa kāṭi
tohore pratagyāṁ nātha kāhāra beḷe suhāyiba | 58 |
hātharu ghenile deba dhanu śahasra uchuḍi | 59 |
kāhāku kopa tu ye karu phālaguni
yāhara nāme kampai brahmāṇḍa khaṇḍa tni | 60 |
brahmā rudra indra candra sūryya lokapāḷa ādikari
bhmabi dhāriṇa ho aṭanti aṣṭakuḷā nāge
karṇna śalya śakuni driyodhana gale ghuñchi
tu kisa pratagyāṁ karuchu ho sarbasācī | 63 |
mattagarbe kahilu ho tohora nāhiṁnā hetu
bhūśirī sampada buḍaiṇa tuhi āśrekaru mr̥tu ||
peṭa chaḍi tu ey piṭhiku koḷakari}
brahma rudra indra candra sūryya āmbhe samasteheṁ ḍari | 66 |
tohora mohora beḷe tāhāku kisa kari
ẏehikṣaṇi tāhāri āge kehi nohiba ubhāri | 67 |
dekha dekha arjuna boli koḷakari dhari
pachakati thāi se dekhāi dile debakī tanaẏe | 72 |
traseṇa pātha yāi nandighoṣa rathe uṭhi
bhīmasena boile re dhuśāsana hoilu nirekhā
iṣṭadebatā sumara re tora kehi nohileta sākhā | 75 |
sahadeba mukhe chāhiṁ bolai bhīma mahārāṇa
bābu dropatīkaiṁ gheni re āsaṭi ẏehikṣaṇi | 76 |
puṣyeka bimāna gheni miḷilā bāruṇābanta kati | 77 |
chātaka pachī jāṇi se dropada dulāḷī
bhīmaenakaiṁ bāṭa chāhiṁacchi śrīkare gheniṇa arghyathāḷī | 78 |
ẏemantara samaẏe yāiṁ sahadeba hoilā parabeśa
dropatī keśa mukaḷa dekhiṇa manare hasa hasa | 79 |
lg.note: puṣpaka bimāna caḍhiṇa caḷilā taḍati |(cha, ja, ta, dha, pa)
lg.l: sahadeba yahuṁ se bijaẏe kalā ẏekā
drahāsa hoi boile yahuṁ sahadeba mantrī
āsa āsa debī go bimāne bijekara
keśa mukuḷita kaṣṭa āja yiba tora pāra | 82 |
yebe tote se anurāga kaleka bhīmasena | 83 |
āge dhūśāsana ye pāḍilā bhīmasena ṭhākuraṁku
brikodar amūrati dhari ṭhākure pāḍile tāku taḷe | 87 |
mote rāikari bhīmasena ṭhākure kale āgyāṁ | 89 |
beikodara mūrati dekhi debī kale trāsa | 90 |
ẏehi abatāra madhye bhīmasenaiṁ mohora svāmī | 91 |
tohora apāda ye paḍu mohora mātha
ẏemante kahuṁ kahuṁ pāśare miḷile turita | 92 |

84|2 “padmarekhā bāḷī”–yeuñ nārīra hāthare
padma ākārara rekhā thāe e ati saubhāgyabatī nārī |
basicchi dhuśāsana upare bhīma sātatāḷa ucca | 95 |
talaẏe kari dekha mohora bhaira mukhagoṭi
brikodara sannidhye dropatīki bege kalā āṇi | 99 |
bolai bhīmasena go talaẏe kari cihna
kete kete guṇa ẏe go kariacchi tote
upugārī puruṣa paḍi na thilā ẏetekāḷa pariyante | 101 |
ābarahiṁ biśeṣe se koṭiẏe ruṣi gheni
tu chara pāmara re dhailu tāra keśa
sabhāra taḷe tāku nei kalu re bibasra | 104 |
aneka bhartsanā kalu satīki ye āṇi
ātreṣi keśa tāra dhailu ture jhuṇi | 105 |

div.note: sabhāra taḷare nei kalure jhiṁghāsa |(ka, jha, ja)

lg.l: pāñchāḷīra śire niuḍāibi tora rudhira saruja | 107 |
rudhira pāna karibi re dekhantu sakaḷa | 108 |
re re kaurobā tu paḍilu raṇamajhi
re re kaurobā yama pocchilā tora pāñji | 109 |
re re kaurobā āja pūrilā tora kāḷa
re re kaurobā sarila tora āẏura baḷa | 110 |
re re kaurobā sumara to iṣṭa ye debatā
re re kaurobā sumara tora mātāpitā | 111 |
re re kaurobā jībana tora dhanya dhanya
re re kaurobā ājahuṁ buḍilā tora dhuśāsana nāma | 112 |
re re kaurobā buddhi tohora hīna
re re kaurobā ḍāka tote rakṣākaru āsi driyodhana | 113 |
re re kaurobā tu hoilu nirekhā
re re kaurobā tora nohibe kehi sākhā | 114 |
re re kaurobā ḍāka tote rakṣākaru dhr̥tarāṣṭa bāpa | 115 |
dropatīki boile āja māna pheḍibi tohori | 116 |
bikaḷe boile mote na chuaṁ kumaramaṇi
puruṣa chuiṁte na yogāi muṁ hoicchi stirīdharmiṇī | 118 |
anteśvara pure paśi dhailā mora bāla | 119 |
āṇante caraṇa mora na paḍai taḷe | 120 |
āho caitana dropatīṁka mukharu ẏesanaka bākya śuṇi
dakṣiṇa pañjarāre se prahāra kalā pāde
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
bhmaja upāḍante nirghāta śabada ye pr̥thvī | 125 |
bulāiṇa se bhmaja ākāśaku dilā phiṅgi
lalāṭe phuṭiṇa ye nāsikā bāte gaḷi
se rudhira āpyāna kalā debī ye pāñchāḷī | 131 |
puṇa puṇa kopa tāra yahuṁ nohilāka śānti
āho caitana pratagyāṁ sāccā tāhāra dekhina pañchaḷī
pāśe miḷile ye sundarī aneka gaṇikā
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu satīra kaicchā aneka | 139 |
baḍāi asaṁkya muni he dropatīra bāratā | 140 |
bolanti ye lakṣmī abatāra ẏe dropati
boila ye lalāṭa kaṇṭi ṛhaḷilāka śroṇi
tāhā āpyāna kale triputi hoi amr̥ta pāna jāṇi | 142 |
śuṇa ho mahārājā tu yāhā prakāśi | 145 |
hr̥de na dhalu nuārilu tattva bhedī | 146 |
śuṇa ho mahārājā ye kahanti agasti
śuṇa ho mahārājā ye biṣṇu garbhara praḷaẏe
svarga marttya pātāḷa ẏe tini jagata
bhūtaḷa rāstāntaḷa sutaḷa jaḷa nāhiṁ kicchi
ataḷa nitaḷa bhmabana jaḷa maẏa hoiacchi | 150 |
tāhāra pheru upare aṇākāra biṣṇu nidrā mahayoga | 152 |
sīmasthāne basi susvare bīṇā bajanti dhabaḷāṅgī
yogabaḷe mahāsustha nātha se parama yogī | 154 |
dvāpara yuga āṭhalakṣa cauṣaṭhī sahasra baraṣa
aṭhāra ohāṇe ye hoai ẏeka candre
tebe se nāśa yāānti brahma debatāẏe
sahasra mukha bibhūti ye pañchadaśa pitā | 170 |
pañchabiṁśa badan aye dvādaśa mukha dhātā

div.note:
pañchadaśa brahmāṅkara nāma pothimānaṅkare bhinna dekhādie,
yathā:–nīja, saptabrahma, cyuta, dhata, nityakarma kāraṇa, āṭhaśata mukha, śata
śatamukha dhātuguru brahmayoni, ajani, sahasraja prabhr̥ti nāmamāna
dekhāyāe |

lg.l: āre jaḷa āẏatta kariāsa boli boile mahātamā | 174 |
aṇākāra bacane kari jaḷa bhmabane buli
koṭiẏe brahmāṇḍa jaḷamaẏe āṇṭhuke yānti cali | 175 |
yahuṁ jāta hoile tāhā sabu pāśorile | 176 |
bākyadebī boile re ādihuṁ heḷa jāta
tumbhe mohora ātmaja muhiṁ tumbhara māta | 181 |
mātāṁku anītire kiṁke bola na jāṇi
duṣṭa svabhābe se na śuṇanti tāhāṁkara bāṇī | 182 |

div.note:
“jaḷa bhmabana upanesi brahmāmananta loḍi,” ehi pāda pare
‘gha’ ‘ṭa’ ca, ṇa pothimānaṅkare bhinna pātha |
cauda brahmā khāile se mahā vaiṣṇavī ||

kiḷikiḷā nadare uṭhile bahmā sarba
bolanti mahāsatī samaste nāśayiba ||(ka, cha)

lg.l: ketukā boliṇa se tāhāra nāma hoilā | 184 |
jāta kalu ye mote kisa ādhāra karibi | 185 |
bākyadevī boile yebe ādhāra kalu icchā
ẏe pañchadaśa brahmānta ādhāra kari bhakṣa yā pūru to manabāñcchā | 186 |
āho caitana se ketukāra ẏekai badana ẏekai caraṇa-ahibrateka bhmaja |
ẏeka śarīra soma sūryya anaḷa se tini
ye paẏāṇa kale ude asta dibā raẏaṇī | 188 |
pañchadaśa brahmāṁku se neucchi ghauḍi kheḍi | 189 |
se medamedā māṁsa debī samasta bhojana ye kari | 190 |
cauda brahmānta māriṇa debī tāhāṁka māṁsa khai | 191 |
bāhuḍi paḷāila bhaẏeṇa se ẏeka mahātamā | 192 |
biṣṇu nātha caraṇe śaraṇa paśilāka āsi
śūdraka brahmā boile svāmi muṁ śaraṇa tohora | 194 |

div.note:
śadraka sthānare adhikāṁśa pothimānaṅkare someka pāṭha
dekhāyāe |

lg.l: ẏehāku rāiṇa muṁye kopeṇa āgyāṁ dili
cauda brahmānta ẏe goḍāiṇa kalā bhakṣa
ẏe yebe śaraṇa paśilā debī tumbhe ẏehāku rakha | 198 |
satya tretaẏā ante dvāpara yuga houacchi
se yuga pariyantetu ẏehāku thāa rakhi | 199 |
ketukā boile svāmi ẏe mohora grāma
ẏehāku grāma kale śarīra hoiba mo toṣa | 200 |
pañchadaśa brahma khāa boli boile bākyadebī
nirañjana boile tu āgyāṁ diasi go dhabaḷī
śūdraka nāme brahmāku rakṣā kari se thāu mahīsthaḷī | 202 |
bākya debī boile tu samaẏe ẏehāku rakha
tretāyuge hoiba ẏe bāḷī ye sugrība
bhāratha yuddha ye hoiba pāṇḍaba driyodhana | 207 |
tetraẏā yuge hoibu tu indrara bhāriyā śacī
dvāpara yuge tote ho dropatī rūpe bhogya acchi | 209 |
ketkā rūpe tu ẏehāra bhakṣilu caudabhrātha
se rāge dvāpare tote abasthā deba ẏe bahuta | 210 |
sabhāra taḷaku tote neba keśa dhari
bibasta kariba tote se gatarāga sumari | 211 |
pāṇḍaba bhīmaena tohora hoiba ye pati
samarena ẏehāra bhaja upāḍi deba bahuta śāsti | 212 |
tohora śire nei deba se rodhira
sebeḷe rodhira ẏehār aāpyāna tu kara | 213 |
ẏekabarṇṇa pāṭoḷī basra ye pañchāuna koṭi
tāhā māḍi basiba ẏe āśrama puṇyakuṭī | 215 |
ẏekabaḷā boile basra debaiṁ yebe muṁ tote
dvāpara yugare bāhuḍāi debuṭi ki mote | 217 |
mote śāpya hāde dilā kapiḷā mora māẏe
dropatī rūpe muṁ mr̥tyu maṇḍaḷe jāta hoẏe | 218 |
pañchāuna koṭi basra debu tu tetebeḷe | 219 |
tretaẏā yugare ẏehu indrara hoithilā gharaṇī
bibādeṇa indra ye bhūta maharuṣinta māilā
tāhāra pitā tvaṣṭā maharuṣi kopeṇa aila | 224 |
nārade boiel tu ho paḷāa surapati
śūnyeṇa ẏeka ātmā surapati ye thoile | 228 |
āho indra tu māilu mohora agyāna bāḷaiśṣi | 230 |
indra boilā māili muṁ sampadara arthe
bhasma hoa indra tvaṣṭāẏe boile kopacitte | 231 |
ākāśa gaṅgākūḷe śacī basi karuacchi śokanāda | 232 |
pārbatī debīṁki koḷe gheni br̥ṣabha upara | 233 |
pārbatī boile stirīẏe kāndu acchi ẏe kāhara bhāriyā | 234 |
īśvare boile se aṭanti kisa jāti
aparace tirīṁki chuiṁbā na yogāẏe yugati | 235 |
brahmakṣetre kāṭhābeṅga hoai tāhāra ye śarī | 237 |
na kānda na kānda āī go tohora kebaṇa asaṅgati | 238 |
patiṁ dehi patiṁ dehi boiel pañchu bāra
toṣe hara boile tohora hou pañchu bara | 239 |
śacī boile deba ẏeta hoilā anīti
īśvare boile tu śuṇa go indrāẏeṇī
kapiḷāra śāpya go tuhi ki na jāṇi | 241 |
sadyuṁ jāta hoilā ye dharmarāẏe yujheṣṭhi | 243 |
pabanara bīryye jāta hoicchi bīra bhīmā | 244 |
indrara pañchu ātmā ẏe hoile pañchujaṇa
tu debī utapatti hua yā dr̥pada ghareṇa | 246 |
se anaḷe thila ye anādi śakati
dvāpara yuge dropatī nāma ẏe bahiacchi | 253 |
tu ye aprate galu rodhira āpyāna śuṇi
pūrbaru bidhāna hāde āmbhe achuṁ jāṇi | 254 |
ẏekā śūdraka brahmā yahuṁ rakṣā helā
nārāẏaṇaṁka bākye ẏebe dhuśā rūpe janamilā | 256 |
se ketukā ye ẏebe dropatī rūpe jāta
ẏe prasaṅga śuṇi toṣa hoile mahārājā
agastiṁki pādārghya deiṇa kalā dibya pūjā | 258 |
ketukā boile mātā tumbhara ẏe ki gati
pañchubhrathā tumbhara tumbhe aṭa ye asatī | 261 |
kapiḷā bolanti se aṭanti mora bhāi
ayugati katha tulo kahu kisa pāiṁ | 262 |
tohora bhrātha se hoantu dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumana | 263 |
lg.note:
–se ketukā ẏebe helā dr̥pada duhitā
duśā rakta bhakṣilā ẏe pūrbajanma kathā |(tha, na)

lg.l: śakuni boilā tu ho śuṇasi rādheba
samareṇa yahuṁ nāśagale mahārathī bhīṣma droṇa
pratagyaṁ kari māthe bānddhalu āṇi pāṭa | 270 |
prathama dinare tu ho hoilu senāpati
kisa buddhi karibā ẏebe driyodhana nirekha hoilā | 272 |
ẏebe ho bīrabarṇṇa kaha karibā kisa buddhi
rājāku gheni śaraṇa paśibā kāryya hoi siddha | 273 |
karṇna boilā ẏetebeḷe tu ẏehā kiṁpe kahu
pāṇḍabe mānagobinde ẏebe prīti heba kāhuṁ | 274 |

lg.note: “satāṇoi bhāi ye paḍileka ẏekaghānti” pāṭha pare ‘cha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha acchi |
lg.l: śalyaṁku boile māmuṁ bege bāha ratha
begeṇa samara muṁ karibi bīra pātha | 276 |
ẏemanta bacana śuṇi śalya āgakalā ratha
āho caitana karṇṇa arjuna ye samara karante
śakunira tule samara karai dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumana
nārāja prahāra karai se gāndhāra nandana | 281 |
sahasreka yoddhā māilā nakuḷa kunta gheni | 284 |
nakuḷara ratha ye hoilā hāde bhagna | 286 |
kunta gheni karṇṇaku prahāra kalā jhāti | 287 |
kuntaghāte karṇṇa mahāmalla kopeṇa rathuṁ ḍeiṁpaḍi

lg.note: andhāreṇa yuddha hoilāka mahāgoḷa |–ḍā, ta, ja, ka |
lg.l: beni khaṇḍa kari kunta pakāilā bhāñji
dhāiṁ yāiṁ karṇṇa ye dhailā nakuḷara bāḷa | 290 |
antarīkṣa mārge tāra keśa dhari jhuṇi
āre āre pāṇḍabā tora śira chedibi ẏehikṣaṇi | 291 |
mātākaiṁ satya muṁ ye kariacchi pūrbe
beḷake nakuḷa re tora rakhilāiṁ prāṇa
ābara beḷe tuhiṭire na paśibu raṇa | 296 |
apāra jhiṁghāsi karṇṇa dilā tāku jhāḍi
dujeṇa karṇṇa yujheṣṭhi debīṁkara baḷa darpadhvaṁsi | 299 |
hāribā jiṇibā ye kṣatrīṁkara sina dharma | 300 |
tu ho nakuḷa trodha karu kisa ye nimante
āmbhe apamāna pāilāiṁ āmbhara sodarara hāthe | 301 |
āna ta bābu āmbhanta na kalā abhimāna
raẏaṇī pāhile se jāṇimā kemante karaiṭi karṇṇa | 302 |
lg.note:
“raẏaṇī pāhile se jāṇibā kemante karaiṭi karṇṇa” ehi
pādānta pare (tha, na) pothire adhika pāṭha–
ẏe kathāku nakuḷa kiṁpāiṁ karu cintā
puṇi yuddhe paśilā se mādrīra santati |
samare aneka male kṣatrī raṇa madhye

“ohobaḷa samara rahilā arjunara śaṅkhaśabada śuṇi”
pāṭha para ṭhāru “ña” pothi pāṭha
draupadī o dhuśāsanara pūrbajanna br̥ttānta
jhīna basana pinddha keśa ye pocchile
nāna ratane bhūṣaṇa kari bhitaraku nele
ẏe katha lāgila mote baḍāi sandeha
pūrbeṇa kehu ẏe aṭai maharāẏe kuha |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāe)
yāhā puchā kalu ẏe pūrbara bidhānu |
ādi satyayuge ẏe ketukā abatāṛa hoẏe
ẏekadine nārada ye tarpaṇa jaḷa kaẏe |
tahuṁṇa sundarī ye galā snāna kari |
srāhana karante jaḷa paḍilā ruṣi dehe
agyānī pāmerī boli ruṣi gāli dile |
yebaṇa śoṇita lo pakāilu mora deheṇa
tu ẏehā āpyāna kara dvāpara yugareṇa |
tu jāta hua lo dropadara ghare
se pañchu pāṇḍage hoibe tora pañchu pati
tāhāra bhmaja upāḍi rodhira deba bhīmasena |
se bhārata yuddhe tu kṣaṇe biśrāmibu |
pūrbaru śāpya tāra ke pāru āna kari |
pūrbara boile ho śuṇa he agasti |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)
lg.l: samare niṣata baḍa hoileṇi sakaḷa saini

lg.note: badanti agasti ye śuṇa tu ho rāẏe
sehi śeṇāpacchī svargara gandharba ye hoẏe |
lg.l: begeṇa piṁka paḍilā dvārī āge yāiṁ |

div.note: sehi mukhe mañche tu naramāṁsa bhakṣa |
tāhā śuṇi indra ye pāilā mahātāpa
bharata yuddhare bhīma māriba senā bhedī |
śeṇā pachī tora bhmaja dhariba turite |
ẏemanta śāpya tāku dileka maghabāna |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: arjunaku kahile ho āja samara rahu rahu | 305 |

div.note: paścima diga se ṣāṭhiẏe yojana sthaḷī
beni pāda beni parbatare dilā dhātikāra |
se pachī bhārā pāi parbata ṭaḷamaḷa
dhuśāsana hāthare ye beni kaṁkaṇa thilā |
se beni kaṁkaṇa ye parbata madhyare paḍilā |
se kaṁkaṇa bhitare ye karanti paẏāṇa |
se rājā ẏekadine mr̥gaẏā galā jhāti |
naba sahasra loka hātere buhā nelā
śuṇa ho mahārājā śrī bhārathara rīti
ẏeṇe dhuśāsana māri bhiaḍe māruti |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: arjuna śahasra chaḍiṇa dilāka jaẏaśaṅkha dhuni
ohobaḷa samara rahilā arjunara śaṅkha śabada śuṇi | 306 | 1322 |

div.note: sakaḷa kuru sainye hoile hata jībana |
śakuni boilā tumbhe aṭa ho nirlaja
satr̥jita pātāṅga kimpā bāndhila ratha dhvaja |
ẏebe se dhuśāsana malā tumbhara raṇe
karṇṇa boilā āja sūryya asta galā
raṇ adhandoḷa ẏeṇe kare pabanara bāḷa |
arghyathāḷi gheni dropatī haraṣa |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)
āja arghya ghenima go pabanara nāna |
sanyamāne ye yāhare caḷile nija pura
taduṁ nitya karma sāriṇa gale deba catradhara |
karpūra tāmboḷa āṇi pāṇḍabe ye dile |
toṣa hoi mahāsatī yācibe tote bara
bolibu kr̥ṣṇa pāṇḍabe na padibu tohora khapara |
bhīmasena saṁgate bahuta prīti kale |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)
bara tumbhe māga ho bīrabara cūḍāmaṇi
kr̥ṣṇa ādi pāṇḍabe na paḍibu khapare tora |
ẏehi bara mote go dia jighnasenī
boile samaste paḍiba ẏekā rahibe yujheṣṭhi
ẏe kūṭa katha tote kahile śrībatsi |
ẏete boli debī ye toṣabanta hoiṁ
ẏethu anantare śuṇa baibasuta manu rāẏe
hā hā bhāi mora prāṇara saṁghāta
keuṁ kati chaḍigalu na jāṇai patha |
aṭhāṇoi bhāi marante na thilā mane prasa |
ẏemante rodana se karai kuru rāja
bho rājā ẏe kathāku na kara kicchi cintā
tohora jībana thile jiṇibu samare maẏemattā |
malā galā lokaku surama kiṁpā karu
kālira samara ye heiba maha kharu |(abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)
karṇṇara samare ye goṭiẏe na taribe |
bhagna baḷa gheniṇa se galā hastinā nagaraku
karṇṇa śalye ye bije kale hastināku |
arghyathāḷī gheniṇa ye bhānumatī bije kalā
mahā trodha hoi rājā arghya na ghenilā |
bhānumati boilā rājā birasa ta mana
śuṇiṇa bhānumatī ye birasa kalā mati

div.head:
{@driyodhanara biḷāpa, śoṇāpakṣī dhuśāsana o
kaṅkaṇara pūrbajanma br̥ttānta@}

lg.l: ẏethu anantara ye mana gobinda rāẏe
dhuśāsnaara hata śuṇi māna ye gobinda
hā hā daiba boli kapāḷe mārai kara dhinda | 2 |
arjili bipuḷa bhoga re tohora parasāde | 3 |
bho maitra ẏethuṁ kisa karibaiṁ yāi muhiṁ
praṇara sakhā nāhiṁ mohora dhuśāsana bhāi | 4 |
śrī mahābharatha kahi muni he pūrāa manabāñcchā | 5 |
kahila ye dhuśāsanara bhmaja kaṇaẏa girira samāna | 6 |
se śeṇā pacchīgoṭi ke aṭai hāde pūrbe
ẏethira tadanta mote kahibā agastimuni debe | 8 |
se dibārātra buluthāi ta bharatha ye yujha | 9 |
dhuśāsana dakṣiṇa bhmaja se dhariacchi thaṇṭe
bāma bhmaja phiṅgidilā tāhā dhailā bāma pāda aṅguṣṭhe | 10 |
āho caitana śūnyare dhāiṁṇa se dhailā bhmaja beni
caurāśī yājana se śūnyeṇa galā gheni | 11 |

div.note:
–“caurāśī yojana se śūnyeṇa galā gheni” pare
“tha” re adhikā pātha–

lg.l: tahiṁ basi khāilā se dhuśāsanara bhmaja | 12 |
ẏe dui parabata madhyare chaḍā kośa sāta | 13 |
ẏekā parabate bhārā na sahilā yahuṁ
dui parabate ye dui pāda dila tahuṁ | 14 |
sātakośa chaḍā se pacchīra pāda beni
dui pañjarā āẏatana hāde yojana tini tini | 15 |
pāñcha yojana uccharga pachīra aṭai śira | 16 |
beni parabate basi tāhāra māṁsa kalā bhakṣa
ḍāhāṇahāthara saraḷabaḷāpaṭi āuji rahilā parbata madhyakaccha | 17 |
se bhmaja paḍi rahilā cauda kalpa pariyanta | 18 |
mallāra deśaku se nr̥pati āsai caḷi
sātaśata mattahāthī ghenigalā saraḷa bhitare gaḷi | 20 |
baibasuta manu boile agasti muni debe
se śeṇāpacchī kebaṇa mahātamā hāde aṭai pūrbe | 22 |
manabhrānti phiṭu śuṇi mote lāgilā sandehe | 23 |

div.note:
–lokāloki beni ye parabata rāja
tahiṁ yāiṁ pakāilā nei duśāsanara bhmaja |(ba, ḍha)

lg.l: aṣṭābatra ruṣi ye baḍa dukha pāi
sarpa ho, sarpa ho boli boilāka sehi | 28 |
sarpa ho sarpa ho boli śāpya se pāilā
se brahma bākye kari naghoṣa sarpa ye hoilā | 29 |
sarpa hoi paḍilā se paṇḍugiri parabate | 30 |
āho caitana sarpaṁkara aṭai yemanta svabhāba
yete sarpa miḷai āhāra karai se ye | 32 |
paṇḍu nāme naghoṣa ye hoithilā sarpe
garude bhaẏa kari se lucilā bane gopye | 33 |
garuḍa bijekalā se paṇḍu nāme giri
se paṇḍu sarpaku se na pāilā loḍikari | 34 |
sahasra baraṣa pariyante se nohilā bāhāra | 35 |
saudāsa rākṣasa bhaẏe kari sehi bimbare paśi | 36 |
sahasrabarṣa paryyante se sarpa thilā upabāse
dekhi nuāpari se hr̥daẏare dhyāẏe kari | 38 |

div.note: –sarpa hoi paḍile se khaṇḍa giri parbate–(cha, ja, ca)

lg.l: aṣṭābatra ruṣi boile tu nāśakalu mohora baṁśa
rājā hoi sarpa hoilu tora priẏojana kisa | 39 |
tohora duhitā ye saurī nāme nāri
to baṁśara māṁsa bhakṣu se śeṇā pacchī rūpa | 40 |
