āho caitana aṣṭābatra śāpyuṁ kari naghoṣa duhite
śeṇapacchī rūpa dhari rahilā duiyuga pariyante | 41 |
bāhāna prāẏeka hoi se nityeheṁ thāẏe bahi | 42 |
satya yuga sataralakṣa aṭhāiśi sahasra baraṣa galā
tretāyuga bāralakṣa chaẏāṇoi sahasra baraṣa sārilā | 43 |
dvāpara yuga āṭhalakṣa cauṣaṭhisahasa baraṣa galā bahi
ẏete kāḷe mahātamā tāku kaleka anugr̥ha
boile re sundarī mote ājyuṁ tu nabaha | 45 |
tu ākāśe uḍuthibu bhāratha samara madhye
dhuśāsana bhmaja bhīma upāḍiba māla yuddhe | 46 |
piṅgi deba se ye ākāśara mārge
tuhi tāhā antarīcche dharibu ye bege | 47 |
tohora baṁśa ye dhuśāsana tu tāhāra māṁsa bhakṣa
agasti boile śuṇa rājā baibasuta manu
naghoṣara duhitā se pūrbe pachī hoithila gaganu| 49 |
kahibā hāde muni he karṇṇa paboṅgra mahiṁmā | 50 |
baibasuta manu boile bhīma dhuśāsana ke ke thile pūrbe
bho muni sañchapi mote ẏehā kahibāka ẏebe | 51 |

div.note:
–tohāra duhitā ye saurabhī nāme nārī |(eṭhāre saurabhī,
śohi prabhr̥ti pāṭhāntaraacchi |)
–naghoṣaraduhitā se pacchī hoithilā sehidinu |(ga, ḍha, ṭha)

lg.l: agasti boile praḷaẏa kājara se kathā
śuṇiṇa agasti ye hoile hasa hasa
dhanya dhanya śrotā tu aṭu manubaṁśa | 53 |
ketuku barithile se kanyāku ye āṇi | 54 |
maṅgaḷaku barithilā puṇi tahiṁpāiṁ samara hoilā
satyayuga sataralakṣa aṭhāiśa sahasra baraṣa bahigalā | 55 |
kaṣṭhora samara dekhi bije kale pitā
boile śūnye tumbhara yuddha kehi nohile dekhantā | 57 |
āditya debatāṁku boile tu sambhāḷa ketuku | 58 |
ẏemante satyayuga yāi tretaẏā hoilā parabeśa
indra āditya paśile gautamaṁka gr̥ha bāsa | 59 |
ahalyā garbhe paśi indra hoileka ātmā
āho caitana indra āditya ẏe dui debatāṁṅka biryye
tahuṁ utapatti hoile beni ye ātmaje | 63 |
gautama koḷa kari dhaile beni baḷā
samodra srāhāna beḷe putra duhitānta gheni
bāli poḍante kākhare dhaile putra beni | 65 |

div.note:
raṇaraṅga ghāte ye kampile daibata
tini bhmabane ẏebe hoilā ulukāpāta |

lg.l: gautama boile re tumbhe jāta yebe anya bīryye
markaṭa hoa tumbhe beni ye ātmajre | 67 |
markaṭa rūpa dhari bāhāra hele putra dui | 68 |
tahiṁra nr̥pati aṭai rāẏe ye khaṛada
se beni putranta nei pāḷilā sānanda | 70 |
bāḷī sugrī hoile se bipuṇya madhyabhāge | 71 |
satyayuge sehu beni bīre ketu ye maṅgaḷa
dvāpare hoile se puṇi bhīma dhuśāsana
yuge yuge ẏehāṁkara bibāda janme janme | 73 |
taba mukhu śuṇili muni bhīma dhuśāsanara bāratā | 74 |
ẏethu uttāre pāṇḍabe keuṁṇa kathā kale | 75 |
agasta boile tu ho śuṇa manu mahārāṇa
mudusulī āge dropatī boile bhīmasenakaiṁ rāi āṇa | 76 |
yāiṁṇa prabeśa hoilā yahiṁ bijaẏe nārāẏaṇe | 77 |
gobinde boile tu śuṇa ho brikodara
dropatī prasanne tote āja debe bara | 80 |
se pāñchāḷīku tuṣṭamane debu āja ruti
palyaṁka teji ubhā ut hoibu yugate | 82 |
bolibu jighnasenī sateheṁ bara yebe debu
pañcha pāṇḍabe kr̥ṣṇa tohora dāṛhe na paḍibu | 83 |
kr̥ṣṇe pratibāca na dei se galā sehikṣaṇi
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
hā hā prāṇanātha boli bāhudarpe koḷakari | 87 |
candra śāḷā pure yāiṁ bijaẏe kale bege | 88 |
se kaḷe trīḍā karanti rati rae māti beni | 89 |
āho bhīmasena bara māga mora hoilā bhagati | 92 |

div.note:
bhīmasena dropatīra ẏeka latāra saṁyoga
yesaneka nīḷotpaḷa jaḍai himasaṅga |–ṇa

lg.l: karapatra yoḍi bhīmasena ubhā ye hoilā
triputi hoilu ki bhīmasena ye boila | 94 |
boilā pañchu pāṇḍabe kr̥ṣṇa na paḍu tohora mūrtti| 95 |
śuna ho rājāna śuṇi dropatī boilā
ẏemanta buddhi ki tote gobinda kahilā | 96 |
tumbhanta ādikari kr̥ṣṇabaṁśa bhakṣibi ẏekā yujheṣṭhiṁki chaḍili | 97 |
ẏethu anantare ye raẏaṇī hoẏe śeṣa | 99 |
śagkha kama kāhāḷa ye bādya marbdaḷa bherī
śuṇa ho manu rājana badaẏantī brahmayatī
dropatī carita bhīmasena kahai śuṇanti śrīpati | 101 |
chāri pāṇḍaba kr̥ṣṇaṁku bhakṣibi dropatī boilā
mohora dāṛharu yujheṣṭhi tariba bhīmasena kahilā | 102 |
parakaiṁ śirī dei nāma tora śirībacchi | 104 |
jaḷare kacchapa rūpe manthana kala sindhu | 108 |
prāṇa apāna byāna udāna samāna pañchu ātmā
svāmī maccha kacchapa koḷa narasiṁgha bābana
praśurāma śrīrāma haḷī baudha kaḷaṁkī rūpa śobhābana | 110 |
svāmi tinibāra ye cintā karai sapata rūpaku
sadālaẏe cintili muṁ aneka janme janme
śrīrāma nāmaku muṁ talaẏe nitye karuṁ karuṁ
mana bacana karatabye āna ye na phuru | 113 |
maudadhi dakṣiṇa koṇe nāma to keśaba
śveta pīta kuṁkuma tini ye pratima
svāmi dātabya puruṣa ye sadānanda bhoḷā
kaḷi kāḷa dhaṁsana nātha ananta koṭi kaḷa | 117 |
svāmi he biṣṇu garbha mahāpraḷaẏa hoilā yebaṇa beḷe
tṇu ẏe kaḷā rūpa bahilu nātha tuhi | 119 |
agāda sāgaru mote uddhari dhara svāmī | 120 |
mana bacana karatabye muṁ taba nāma abhyāsi | 122 |
na jāṇai japa mantra nātha na galāiṁ nānā tīrtha
na sādhili tapa yoga nohili bhagata | 123 |
janme janme mūrkha muṁ ye nohai paṇḍita
bākya debī bhaṇḍāra muṁ baai anubrata | 124 |
janme janme bhagata muṁ śrīrāma padma pāde
śūdramūni pada moraśrī sāroḷā debī parasāde | 125-1447 |

div.head: {@kaṇṇara dvitīẏa dina yuddha o śoṣaka sarpa praẏoga@}

lg.l: baibasuta manu ye agastiṁki kale pucchā
śrī mahābhāratha kahi muni de pūrāa mohora manobāñcchā | 1 |
manuẏe boile śuṇa ho agasti debe
karṇṇara ratheṇa ye śalya rāẏe sārathi
kareṇa dhanu dhari ye rādhebara suta
arjuna uparaku śara br̥ṣṭi kalāka turita | 9 |
śateka nārāja ye tahiṁ binddhala kirīṭī | 10 |
abicchanne nārāja ye karṇna bindhu acchi | 11 |
agni śareka ye bege bindhale rādheba
parbatā śahasra karṇṇa bege dilā peṣi
bajra śahasra māri arjuna tāhā nāśi | 13 |
boilā mote peṣa karṇṇa, muṁ arjunara harai | 14 |
sabunti giḷibi muhiṁ ẏehikṣaṇi peṣa hāde mote | 15 |
karṇṇa boilā ho ẏe nohai chatrī karma
āpaṇāra śastra thāi ye peṣai ānaśara
paraloke paḍai se kṣetrī rauraba narkara | 17 |
karṇṇa boile śāhāsra yugate ẏesaneka pātaka acchi

lg.note: –kaḷikāḷa bije karante se anyoanyi hoile |(ṅa, ca, tha, na, ṛa)

lg.l: ẏe yebe giḷiba nandighoṣa ratha kr̥ṣṇa arajuna | 20 |
yāa ho kālasarpa bhakṣa yā kr̥ṣṇa pātha
nārāja peṣanteṇa sabu sarpa garbhe paśai | 25 |
garjiṇa paḍile ye parbata sasra tini | 26 |
samasta dahija houchanti tāhāra garbhe paḍi | 29 |
se nāgara garbhe yāiṁ paśila agniśara
sahadeba boile yebaṇa beḷe khāṇḍababana dahile phālaguni
khāṇḍaba bane thile se śoṣakara baṁśa
agni dahane sehu samaste gale dhaṁsa | 34 |
arjunaku nāśibi boli hr̥de brata kala | 35 |
śahasra mānanta nei thoiluṁ āmbhe śamībr̥kṣa troti | 36 |
sarpa boilā ta śahasra mana kāḍhibāku uṭhibe pāṇḍabe
āmbhanta ḍhaṁsiba boli se śamībr̥kṣa troṭareṇa thilā
godhana haraṇa kāḷe uttara kumāra br̥kṣare uṭhilā | 38 |
uttara ḍāhāṇa bhmaje ḍaṁka se lagāilā tatakṣaṇānti | 39 |
kaurobe daṇḍa saji yāuthile godhana haraṇe
karṇṇara tahiṁ yāi sarpa paśila śaraṇe | 42 |
khāṇḍaba bana bahana dinu āmbhanta pramāda cintuacchi | 43 |
kr̥ṣṇa boile ẏe birāḷa candra baṁśī
pāṇḍaba baḷa saini ye paḷābanti bhañji
ratha gaja aśva ye paḍai tāhāra mukhakaiṁ
svarga mañcha oṣṭha kari sarba se bhakṣai | 48 |
arjuna śahasraku nāhiṁ mane tāra bhrānti
śrīkr̥ṣṇa bhaẏekale dekhi śoṣaka nāga mūrtti | 49 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile tu śuṇa ho hanumanta
ẏe apāduṁ rakṣākara ẏe nandighoṣa ratha | 50 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇe boile āmbhanta āśre kari pāṇḍabaṁka samara
tohore se pāṇḍabe āja apāduṁ huantu pāra | 51 |
benipāde mūrddhuni dei pātāḷe ratha chāpi | 52 |
bhīṣma rūpa dhari se nandana ārdrābaḷī
nandighoṣa prāẏe bujhi pātāṅga dila giḷi | 54 |
nandighoṣa na dekhi ye karṇṇa kalā sata
boilā sādhu sādhu pratagyāṁ tohora nāga aṭu tu mahata | 56 |
adabhute āsi hoilu tu mote sāhā
kaurobe samaste karṇṇaku kale dhani dhani
nandighoṣa rathe ye thile kr̥ṣṇa pātha
kaḷapi chāri aśve thile dhvaje hanumanta | 59 |
karṇṇara śahasra sarpa ye sabu galā giḷi
āgahuṁ ẏe śahasra yebe binddhathāntā karṇṇa
ẏete sanya kiṁpe nāśa yāānte rājāmāna | 61 |
kāhāra darpe nāśayibe ye kr̥ṣṇa phālaguni | 63 |
pūrbe bikāśila śrīkr̥ṣṇa arjuna kapiketana mūrati | 66 |
dekhiṇa bismaẏa ye hoilā kurakuḷa rājā
rādhebara nandana ye pāilā baḍa lajjā | 68 |
karṇna boilā gurutara adharma muṁ kali
śalya boile nandighoṣa ratha tora pache āsi miḷi
tu āne kāhāku ho āilu hāde gaḷi | 70 |
karṇṇara chamure yāiṁ paḍilā rathara pātāṅga | 71 |
pātāṅga giḷiṇa tu ye hoilu triputi
sarpa boilā karṇṇa ẏe ghānti mote peṣa
ẏe ghānti giḷibi muṁ ratha nandighoṣa | 73 |
pātāḷa sarge nei yebe luchāibe rathagoṭi
sarga mañcha pātāḷa ẏe ghānti tinipura yibi ghoṭi | 74 |

div.note:
ẏesaneke uṣata huante kurupati
nandighoṣa ratha dekhile iśānya bhāga kati |(ta, ṅa, da,)

lg.l: pratagyāṁ sāchā hou tohora bhakṣai kr̥ṣṇa pātha | 75 |
karṇna boilā chatrī hoi yebe samare hoai nisata
arjuna khedi āsuacchi mohora ye thāṭha
āṛho āṛho sarpa tu nirodha na kara bāṭa | 77 |
tu mote goḷa karu kimbhūta kāraṇe | 78 |
nāga boilā mo baṁśara bairi sādhai tora kāryye
ẏe ghānti peṣa muṁ tāhānta karai bhakṣā
karṇna boilā ho tu dekhu dekhu kāḷasarpa
maḷamūtra māḍile pitr̥loke na pābanti pāṇi
khāile mari dekhile ḍari ẏete sarpaṅkara doṣa jāṇi | 83 |
nānā doṣa upekṣi tote thoili nei rathe | 84 |
bīrabara pratagyaṁẏe na dhaili kicchi doṣa
kāḷeṇa mote puṇi phaḷa phaḷilā abaśya | 85 |
baṁśayāka marāi paḷāi āilu tu ẏekā
toho charakaiṁ peṣi muṁ hoili tāṭakā | 86 |
dhika dhika hou tora nāgakuḷa baṁśa
śarīra kimpe tohora rahicchi mohora jhiṁghāsa | 87 |
nilaja prāṇa yāi kinā tohora mūrddhanā yāi phāṭi | 88 |
paḷā yā nilajare na thāa mora rathe
aneka kāryya nāśa galā tohora nimante | 89 |
śuṇa ho rājana rāge boilāka sarpa
āre āre karṇṇa tu bhāñjilu mohor adarpa | 90 |
āre āre karṇna tu jhiṁghāsi mora darpa dhvaṁsu
āja dina arddhe tora rtha bhūmigate paśu | 91 |
beni daṇḍa madhye yebe uṭhiba tora ratha
jiṇantā nohibe kehi tote ẏe tini jagata | 92 |
śāpa deiṇa sarpa paḷāilā gagana ye gati | 93 |
bho rājana sarpa markaṭa ye mañjārī
jāṇu jāṇu yebaṇa janatāku karanti ye rakṣā
kāle āpaṇe naśa yānti ẏe aṭai pratakṣā | 95 |
śaraṇa rakṣā kari karṇṇa basāilā rathe
upugārīki apagāra hoilā ẏe dvāpara yugeheṁ | 97 | 1544 |

div.note: aneka kāryya nāśagalā mohora dekhante |(ṭa, ṇa)
duṣṭa lokaku upugāra nāhiṁta kebeheṁ |(cha, ṅa)

div.head: {@ka rṇṇa ba dha@}

lg.l: karṇṇara chamure nei ratha ye ubhāri | 1 |
puṇi karṇṇa nārāja binddhalā hde sasra tini | 4 |
śahasre nibārai se ye bicitrabīryyara nāti
kuhuka nārāja ye binddhalā bīra karṇṇa
daśadigara madhya ye na diśai kicchi
puṇa peṣilā ye nārāja sahasra chāri
chāri aśvakaiṁ bhedilā se mahānāda kari | 10 |
chāri sahasra nārāja ratha chāri khambaku
nārāja dekhiṇa se keśaba hoile āśriya
ahibrateka nārāja chedila kapi ye ketana
rathara upare ye paḍilā yeteka śara
agnimunā bāneka ye binddhalā bhāroi malla
bāhuḍi kauroba thāṭhe hoilā agni br̥ṣṭi | 24 |

div.note: śikhā lāgilā svarga sarbe hoile ākuḷa |

lg.l: meghā śareka ye binddhala bīra karṇṇa
kandhu cchiḍi taḷe paḍe śira koṭi koṭi | 30 |
bahuta baḷa cañchaḷ aẏe kurusāgara yodhī
yābata thāṭha dekhiṇa dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumane
laba lakṣa yoddhā gheni uṭhile ẏekamane | 37 |
gaja yoddhā tule ẏehāra tini lakṣa mattabaḷa | 39 |
sabuṁkari kare ye nabaniśi konta yāṭhi
konta khaḍaga guruja, munā lāṁkiā mūṣaḷa yāṭha
daṇḍa gheni śaṁkuni ye bheṭilā yujheṣṭhi | 43 |
śaṁkuni boilā rājā raha raha yujheṣṭhi
rathare thaiṇa ye tāhā dekhile banamāḷī | 46 |
nanda ghoṣa bāma pākhe achai sahadeba
āho sahadeba śaṁkuni yujheṣṭhiṁki bahuta kaṭāḷiba | 47 |
chāgaḷa pala dekhi yehne dhāmaiṁ matta byāghra | 48 |
śakunira āge nei ratha kalā puṇi | 49 |

div.note: kunta bajuśakati gheni ogāḷai bala |(ṅa, ta, ja)

śaṁkuni sahadebara ẏeka mukha śuṇi
pāṇḍabaṁkara tule thāṭha ye pālāṇi |(ja, ta, ṅa, gha)
tote māile ẏekāṅga rājya pāiba dhr̥tarāṣṭa |(kha)

lg.l: hāthī aśva māḍi ye paḍuchanti apramaẏe | 51 |
dhanu ādhāna sandhana praḷaẏa megha jāṇi
maḍāmaḍi hoi paḍanti na yānti gaṇitā | 53 |
bho rājana debaṁku durlabha ye karṇṇara samara
romeka śata nārāja ye peṣai kharatara | 54 |
yāha se śāpa dila śoṣaka kāḷasarpa
karṇṇa boilā tu śuṇare bābu pātha
samara kṣaṇeka biśrāmakara muṁ toḷai mora ratha | 59 |
tu ye kṣatrīkuḷe bahu śaraṇa pañjara bānā
birathī yoddhāku śara na karu ādhānā | 60 |
āho arjuna samara carita acchinā ẏemanta
yāha se likhana kalā prajāpati daibata | 61 |
keśa mukuḷa hoile na mari tāku raṇe
biśahasra hoile na māri dharma acchi ẏeṇe | 62 |
śahasra chaḍi ye kara dianti kapāḷe | 63 |

div.note:
tuye kṣatrikuḷe bahu śaraṇa pañjara pada
birathī yoddhāku ye na karu pramāda |(ṅa, ṭa, ca, ṇa, dha, na)

lg.l: yāna chaḍi mukhe ye bharanti daśanahe | 64 |
śaraṇa boile na māri kirīṭī boli chaḍi
pithi dilā śatr̥ku samare na māri | 65 |
babu yebaṇa śatr̥ śastra chaḍi nisata huanti raṇe
bharahara bhāratha ẏeṭi raṇa yāga bhūmi | 67 |
kiṁcita pātake ye aḷapa hoẏe doṣa
ubhaẏa kuḷa sāṁgrāmakuhiṁ hari hanumanta sākṣi | 69 |
karṇna boilā kṣaṇeka tu biśrāma karasi pātha
beni daṇḍa uttāre uṭhiba mora ratha | 70
karṇṇara mukharu yahūṁ binaẏa bacana śuṇi
gobinde boile ho bindhasi bege bāṇa
karṇṇara śirakamāḷa tu kāṭi pakāa ẏehikṣaṇa | 72 |
arjuna boilā svāmi ẏe hoicchi birathī
dharma bichāraku ẏe na yogāi yugati | 73 |
ratha uṭhiba yebe beni daṇḍara madhye
ẏeḍe baḍa rathīki kiṁke māribā binā yuddhe | 74 |
dharma āchāre tumbhe bañchanā kāḷa sarba | 75 |
āho karṇṇa tumbhara dhārmikapaṇa poḍu poḍu
nāgeṇī khāu boli bānddha melila agāda jaḷe | 77 |
ghareka bhiāila jau, sajaḷasa, guā, ghr̥ta chaṇapaṭe | 78 |
āho karṇna banaste bulante pāṇḍaba pāñchabhāi
dharmara baḷe kanyāẏe prāpata helā tahiṁ | 81 |
kete dukha na dilaṭi ẏehi pāṇḍabaṅku | 82 |
kūṭabhāṣā kahiṇa sabhāre na dila basāi | 83 |
sabhāre basi kari bhiāila kapaṭa pāśā
rājyabhāra ghenila tumbhe se hoile niāśā | 84 |
samssteheṁ sadha kala dekhibāku jānu yaubana
āho karṇṇa tumbhara sabu kathā se śohai
ẏemāna ye kala tumbhara kebaṇa dharma hoai | 88 |
āre cauda baraṣara pua bāḷuta ye tanu
na jāṇi samare ta paśilā abhimanyu | 89 |

div.note: “kāḷeka brata tumbhe dharma pratipāḷi” pare ‘ka’ pothire pātha :–
āho karṇṇa banaste bulante pāṇḍaba pāñchabhai
mugaẏā binode ẏehānta nela ye kaṛhāi |
sindhu deśa rājā yadyarathaku paṭhaāila ẏeṇe

lg.l: aneka saini ye māilā yahuṁ roḷe
beṛhi māra boliṇa ye samaste kala goḷe | 90 |
beṛhiṇa māila tumbhe tumbhara dharma ẏeḍe bidhi | 91 |
śrkr̥ṣṇa kopa jāta abhimanyu kathā kahuṁ kahuṁ
kṣaṇakaiṁ rakṣā ẏehāku na kara bīra pātha
beni daṇḍara madhye toḷiba ẏehu ratha
se ratha uṭhile tralokye kehi nāhiṁṭi sāmaratha | 94 |
nisata nuha karṇṇa ho kare ghena dhanu | 95 |
ātmā baikulya mora houcchi putra trodhe
abaśya nāśa tote karibi binā yuddhe | 96 |
dhanu ādhāna sandha na kalāka sarbasācī
dekhiṇa karṇṇakaiṁ ye na puṁrai kicchi| 97 |
śalya boile ho samara kara bīra karṇṇa
nisata hoile tote na rakhaiṭi arjuna | 98 |
dhanu ādhāna kari nārāja kope dhari | 99 |
kisa śahasra bindhiba karṇṇa pādagati hoi mañchā | 101 |
lāgheba śahasre ye arjuna tāhā chedi | 102 |
aneka jhiṁghāsa kalā karṇṇa śoṣaka kāla sarpaku | 103 |
beḷa arddhe ratha tora basu bhubibhāge | 104 |
beni ghaḍira madhye yebe pāribu ratha toḷi
jiṇantā nohu tote bahmā indra rudra bhali | 105 |
babu dui daṇḍaku daṇḍe hoilāni śeṣa
puṇa sāṁgrāma yebe karaiṭi ratha caḍhi
adhacandra nārāja ye pātha peṣilā tatakṣaṇānti | 108 |
śahasra bighāte karṇṇara cchiḍilāka hāde muṇḍa
puṇa kandharu muṇḍeka ye hoilā utapatti
karṇṇara śarīra ye prabhāta sūryya jyoti | 110 |
yeuṁṇa nārāje tripura dahile deba hara | 112 |
se śara ātreṣiṇa kopeṇa bīra chaḍi
puṇi jāta hoilā āra ẏeka muṇḍa | 114 |
arjuna boilā hari ẏeta baḍāi dulabha
puṇa puṇa muṇḍa upujai keuṁṇa bhāba | 115 |
sahadeba boilā ẏe āditya bīryya jāta
amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa, bajrachaurī abheda kapaca dile dinakara nātha | 117 |
śarīre lepile ẏehāra bajra ye chaurī | 118 |
ẏemāna na bhediba ye tāhāra nija gāṭra | 119 |
amr̥ta kr̥ṇḍaḷa āditya chāpile tāra śrabaṇe
karṇṇa bīrara deba mr̥tu nāhiṁ ẏeṇe | 120 |
āditya raśmi lāgi amr̥ta jhariba kuṇḍaḷe
sahasre nāgara se baḷa pāi uṭhi
puṇi dhanu dhari se jiṇiba naba sr̥ṣṭi | 122 |
tāḷure acchi ye abheda kapaca maṇi
bajra chaurī amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa āṇile bāsabe | 124 |
svāmi jāṇi tā birañchi nārāẏaṇa boile kemanta karibi
ẏebe mora putrakaiṁ amara kariṇa sañchāibi | 125 |
āditya debata bije kale sehi rāti
mrakata liṅgeka bakṣasthaḷe chāpile dinakara jyoti | 126 |
nānā śastra paḍile śvarīre hoanti sarbe nāśi | 127 |
sahadeba kahilā mrakata liṅgeka acchi ẏehāra hr̥de
teṇu se karṇṇa badha nuhai deba hāde | 128 |
sahadeba boilā se mrakata liṅga yebe jaḷi
tebe se karṇṇa deba paḍiba mahīāḷī | 129 |
gobinde boile se liṅga dahana karibā kemante
ẏekā ghāntike ẏehā yebe binddhabe phālaguni | 131 |
tini khaṇḍa hoi paḍiba karṇṇa raṇa madhye | 133 |
pātāḷa bhmabanu ye āsilā nīḷa bāṇa
gale ye tini bāṇa kariṇa ghora raḍi | 140 |
śahasra kiraṇa nīḷacatra kaṇṭhe yāiṁ paḍi
karṇṇara muṇḍa cchiḍilā male amr̥taliṅga mahātmā
agniteja śikhe galā sambhāḷile āditya debata | 144 |
bhāratha yuddha hoilā makara śukaḷa dutīẏāra tithi | 145 |
bāẏabya nāme karaṇa atigaṇḍa nāme yoga | 146 |
bhīṣme daśa dibasa droṇe pāñcha ye dibasa
duidina arddhe samara kalaka sūryya śiṣya | 147 |
satara dina dui prahara hoilāka ẏebe
śauri9bāra hastā nakṣatra yama ghaṇṭa yoge
karṇṇa paḍilā tahiṁ beḷa dui ye prahara
hā hā putra boli ye gagana behārī
trodha abasthā ye karṇṇa nāma dhari | 152 |
bābure nityakarma sāri ubhā hoile tu pr̥thva
ḍare basudhā śatebhāra kaṇaẏa lāñcha diai nitye | 155 |
kābu śatebhara subarṇṇa nitye tu deu dāna
dāne māne śūrabanta tu aṭu ho mahābaḷī karṇṇa | 156 |
bābu bharathe bhāroi malla tohora biradhū
kapaca kuṇḍaḷa dāne lachī chaḍilā tohāra kandhu | 157 |
samasta dāna dei tu āśre kalu kāḷasarpa
sehi uḍaṅga kāḷe harilā tohora darpa | 158 |
aneka trodha kale ye birañchi nārāẏaṇa
hā hā maitra boli matta hāthī kalā tejyā
mr̥tupiṇḍa koḷa kari dhailā mānagobinda rājā | 160 |
hā hā maitra mora ye kṣatri kuḷe baḷabantā
dāne khāṇḍe śūrabanta kṣatriẏa sakatā bakatā | 161 |
kapaca dānī karṇṇa boli śubhai tinipura | 162 |
khaṇḍa khaṇḍa kari kāṭila putrara māẏeṁsa
tohora satyabrata dekhi jīāṁile tohora putre | 165 |
dāne śūrabanta boli nāma dile tote
tu ẏebe anāsta kari chaḍigalu mote | 166 |
maitra pratagyaṁ kalu ye pāṇḍabanta māribu boli
tohora bāhāku muṁ ādihaṁ aśre kali | 167 |
ante maitra mukuhiṁ kalu ye nirāśa | 168 |
pr̥thī na sahai maitra tohera chālante
pāṇi drabya śatebhāra lāñcha diai ye nitye | 169 |
teteka maitra dānaku na aṇṭai tote
kāḷeṇa maitra tu nirāśa kalu mote | 170 |
bho maitra kāhāra āgare kahibi mohora kaṣṭa
ẏekā jaṇake buḍāilu ẏe mohora rāṣṭra | 171 |
śaraṇa uddhāraṇa maitra daẏā sāgara biradhū
kapaca dānī boli trailokye tote sādhu sādhu | 172 |
bhārathe bhāroi malla tu kaicchāṁ jagajjeṭhī | 173 |
kehu toḷi pārilāka brahmāṇḍa khaṇḍa garu | 174 |
kapca kuṇḍaḷa dāna indrakaiṁ dilu mitra
bho maitra mahībhāra uddhāraṇa tu paramānanda yogī
trailokya jiṇimāku ẏekā sāmaratha aṭu raṇe
maitra bhīṣma droṇe nāśagale muṁ na pāili kicchi byathā
maitra bipāka karma ẏe mohora poḍu poḍu
tohora guṇa sumari mohora prāna chaḍu | 179 |
maitra, chatrīguru debaguru mitraguru ābara bedaguru
guru guru paramaguru tu māna ye uddhāru | 180 |
maitra bhānumatī saẏembare na kalu tu kāhā
maitra āṁkocita keśa kapāḷa ẏeka khaṇḍa
maitra paharaka kadhye jiṇilu samasta mahīpati
aneka bhagati maitra tu debatā brāhmaṇe
nidhana hoilu tu mohora karma mandapaṇe | 184 |
muhiṁ ye maitra tote dāna māguacchi
raṇayāga binu mote nohu āna kicchi | 185 |
bho maitra mote andhāra diśilā daśadiśa
maitra, mohora ye mukha maḷiṇa kṣaṇeheṁ na sahu
ẏehenneka trodhe kiṁke kathā ta na kahu | 187 |
abhaẏe puruṣa tu bāchaẏe kaha mote phiṭu
śalya ratha sāji aileṇi tu kiṁpe na uṭhu | 188 |
bhūmire paḍai rāja māna ye gobinde | 189 |
mohora dukha dekhi kipe na chāhuṁ neuṭi | 190 |
andhara lauḍi tu lucilu kāhiṁ mita
aneka trodha kalāka māna ye gobinda
mr̥tupiṇḍa chaḍi rājā kapāḷe kara dhinda | 192 |
maitra ẏeḍeka nirddaẏā boli jāṇanti yete tote
pāṇḍabe bibādī muṁ huanti kisa arthe | 193 |
aneka trodha se tahiṁ karante kurupati
na sarai trodha āsi aḍhāi prahara rāti | 194 |
digāmbara hoi bikaḷe robai kurunātha sāiṁ | 195 |
prāṇara mita karṇṇa thilā tohora ye tula | 197 |
tohora parā sārathi thāuṁ karṇṇa nāśa galā

div.note:
mr̥tupiṇḍa chaḍi rājā kapāḷe kara dhinda pare ‘ba, ḍha’ pothire pāṭha
ẏekā ākhaḍāẏe bidyā śikhāile droṇaguru
dhanyare pārthiba tu badha kalu mahāmeru |
tahiṁki candramā tu aṭu ho dhanurjaẏe |

lg.l: mote ẏekachatra rajya deba boli ye boila
bipāka karmaku mora samaste tūnī yehoila | 199 |
āja mote mukuṭa bāndha ho nr̥pati | 200 |
saṅge sakhā mora thāāntu se śakuni
āja nāśa karibi muṁ kr̥ṣṇa pālaguni | 201 |
duiśa bāstarī kṣauṇī māna gobindara baḷa
naba kṣauṇī mātra acchi paḍileṇi sakaḷa | 205 |
sarbe acchi sakhā pāñcha lakṣa ratha | 206 |
nabapadma gaja yoddhā ādi ye bhiāṇe
daśa lakṣa gaja yoddhā acchi paḍileṇi sabu raṇe | 207 |
aśipadma bājī yoddhā samara beḷe thilā
samaste paḍi lekoḍiẏe lakṣa bājī yoddhā rahilā | 208 |
se sanya gheniṇa ye śalya mahārathī
ẏeteka saini ye gheniṇa pañchu bīre
śaṁkunira tule acchi naba sahasra rathī | 213 |
śaṁkunira āge miḷilā madanā debīra suta | 214 |
sahadeba boilā māmuṁ kemante tora buddhi
taba pitr̥ kāryya ta hoilā sabu siddhi | 215 |
ẏebe rājyaku tora yāa yā apasari
sukheṇa rājya kara yāi gāndhāra adhikarī | 216 |
mukuṭa bānddhabā dekhi muṁ hoili biṣāda
śaṁkuni boilā bābu śuṇa he sahadeba
ādihuṁ muṁ tote kahi nāhiṁki priẏabhāba | 218 |
mora pitā gāndhārasena ẏehāku na kalā kicchi doṣa
adabhūte pathara ghare bhari nāśakalā mora baṁśa | 219 |
śaẏe satāṇoiṁ jaṇa paśila pathara ghare
sehi rāge kari muṁ ẏehāra baṁśa marāili | 221 |
muhiṁ se paśākheḷa karaili kapaṭa ye kūṭe
muhiṁ se ghareka bhiāili jau sajaḷasa guāghr̥ta chaṇapaṭe | 222 |
mohora buddhi baḷe kurupāṇḍaba sohodra prāṇa chaḍu | 223 |
pitāra bacane niprohī hoili cihnu cihnu | 224 |
bābu sahadeba re ẏeteka pāteka arajilā acchi muhiṁ
kete sanya paḍileni ẏe kurukṣetra bhūiṁ | 225 |
brahma kṣatriẏa baśya śūdra datya dānaba rākṣasa
sanya sākha gheni paḍile aṣṭādaśa baṁśa | 226 |
ẏeteka yoddhā bābure paḍile mohora hetu
apasari gale kemante pāra hebi naraka panthu | 227 |
bābu aneka pātaka kehi baṁśare karithile
samasta kṣaẏe yāi annachatra yāga kale | 228 |
bābu aneka pātaka yebe karithiba baṁśa
samasta tyāja akri yebe prāṇa dei jhāsa | 229 |
bābu baṁśare yebe pātaka hoi abidhi
ẏeka citte ye brahmagyāna pārai sādhi | 230 |
athabā samare yebe dei pārai jhāsa
tebe se pāra yāi nānā pātakara doṣa | 231 |
ābra śarīra arthe bratibāka kisa buddhi | 232 |
bābu aṣṭādaśa dibasara madhye mohora samara bhāga
māribi tumbhanta āja karibi raṇa yāga | 233 |
śaṅkha catra gadapadma śobhita sārathi debaraja
nanda ghoṣa rathe ẏe kapi ketana dhvaja | 234 |
baikuṇṭha bāsī hebā aneka pātaka upekhi | 235 |
bābu yebaṇa dinuṁ kuru pāṇḍaba paśileka raṇe

div.note:
“sanya sākhā gheni paḍile aṣṭādaśa baṁśa” pādānta pare ba, ta
pothire adhikā pāṭha |
ẏemante śate bhagnījāẏe male mohora hetu kari |(bi, ṭha)
ābara rājya arthe bratibāka kisa buddhi |(ka, ca, gha)

lg.l: bābu tārākṣī pachī ye bhīṣmaṁka śare paḍilā
bābu tahiṁra ante ye paḍilā ambikāname chāṇḍāḷa
se nakṣatra hoi basila dibi ye maṇḍaḷa | 238 |
abaśya karibā pṇa kāhiṁ pāibā ẏeḍeka sulabha | 239 |
jaẏatu jaẏa bharata kuḷa maṇḍana śrīpuruṣauttama
jaga bandana nātha maṇi jaẏatu śrīrāma | 240 |
svāmi durāntaka pātaka barśane tora dukha khaṇḍi
bhārā nibāraṇa nimante bharatha yuddha maṇḍi | 241 |
bibudha janara nātha yugāntaka kāḷa bhogī | 243 |
yābata kāḷe ananta koti jība dātā
samasta aśakata nātha samasta ẏeka karantā | 244 |
nīḷasundara giri dakṣiṇa bārānidhi uttara taṭe | 245 |
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni kalpa baṭa chaẏā
kaḷikāḷa bidhaṁsana nīḷa utpaḷa yāra kaẏā | 246 |
svāmi śveta pīta kuṁkuma bikasita tinirūpa
saṁsāra sāgara tāraṇaku dharila bauddha rūpa | 247 |
svāmi dhīrajana mānaṁkara hr̥daẏa kamaḷa māḷī
yābata antara nātha tuhi se sarbasākṣī | 251 |
svāmi śrī mahābhāratha īkṣu daṇḍara madhyaboli
taba āśre dhyāna kari pada kicchi bañcchāili | 252 |
muṁ tāhā sañchapi kari kahibāku kisa sāmarathā | 253 |
anādi maheśvaī śrī sāroḷā caṇḍī debī
janme janme abhyāsai muṁ tāhāra caraṇe sebī | 254 |
jambu dvīpa sāra bhūiṁ mahodadhira iśānya koṇa āḍe
traẏaloke bara dātā śrī sarba maṅgaḷā | 257 |
śrī caṇḍī sāroḷā pāde janme janme muhiṁ sebi
muhiṁ tāṁka caraṇe sāroḷa dāsa kabi | 258 | 1802 |
